bt: Laboratory evaluations were normal, but serum dopamine (425 ng/l) and 24-hour urine dopamine (1,565.3 g/day) levels were elevated and indicated a possible neurological pathology.

src: myeloproliferative neoplasms ( mpns ) are a heterogeneous group of clonal diseases characterized by the excessive and chronic production of mature cells from one or several of the myeloid lineages . recent advances in the biology of mpns have greatly facilitated their molecular diagnosis since most patients present with mutation(s ) in the jak2 , mpl , or calr genes . yet the roles played by these mutations in the pathogenesis and main complications of the different subtypes of mpns are not fully elucidated .
bt: Melanopoly-proliferative neoplasms (MPNs) are a heterogeneous group of clonal diseases characterized by excessive and chronic production of mature cells by one or more of the melodic lineages.Recent advances in the biology of MPNs have greatly facilitated molecular diagnosis since most patients present mutations in the JAK2, MPL or CALR genes, and these mutations are often associated with a worse prognosis.

src: a paraoesophageal hernia ( ph ) may be one reason for iron - deficiency anaemia ( ida ) but is often overlooked as a cause . we aimed to assess the incidence and resolution of transfusion - dependent ida in patients presenting for hiatal hernia surgery . we analysed a prospective database of patients undergoing laparoscopic hiatal repair in order to identify patients with severe ida requiring red cell / iron transfusion .
bt: A paraoesophagic hernia (ph) may be one of the reasons for iron deficiency anemia (ida) but is often overlooked as a cause.We have tried to evaluate the incidence and resolution of blood-dependent IDA in patients who are presenting for a hyatal hernia surgery.We have analyzed a prospective database of patients undergoing laparoscopic hyatal repair to identify patients with severe IDA who require a transfusion of red/iron cells and have respiratory problems.

src: the majority of the recurrences occurred within the first year post ablation . one hundred and twenty three patients had a history of atrial fibrillation ( af ) prior to cti ablation and 85 ( 69% ) of those remained having af after cryoablation . in 20 of 57 ( 35% ) patients without a history of af prior to cti ablation , af occurred during follow-up.conclusionsthis prospective study showed a 91% chronic success rate ( range 12 to 60 months ) for cryoablation of the cti in patients with common type afl and ratified the frequent association of af with afl .
bt: Most relapses occurred within the first year after the ablation.One hundred and twenty-three patients had a history of atrial fibrillation (AF) before the ablation and 85 (69%) of those who remained with AF after the cryoablation.In 20 of the 57 (35%) patients without a history of AF before the ablation, AF was found during follow-up.Conclusions: Prospective studies showed a chronic success rate of 91% (with an interval of 12 to 60 months) for the cryoablation of CF in patients with common type of AF and who frequently associated with AF.

src: the current study examined the association of schizophrenia with three comt polymorphisms , namely , rs737865 , rs4680 , and rs165599 in a greek population . there was no significant association between schizophrenia and any of the three snps examined . however , haplotype analysis showed that cases have higher frequency of the t - a - a haplotype , and participants with that haplotype were at increased risk for developing schizophrenia ( or = 1.52 ; cl : 1.122.08 ; p = 0.008 ) .
bt: The current study examined the association of schizophrenia with three comti polymorphisms, namely, rs737865, rs4680 and rs165599 in a Greek population.There was no significant association between schizophrenia and any of the three snps examined.However, the analysis of the aplotyp showed that cases with a higher frequency of the aplotyp t-a and participants with such an aplotyp were at a higher risk of developing schizophrenia (odds ratio = 1,52; confidence interval: 1.12-2.08; p = 0.008).

src: to verify the relationship between vaginal ph and human papillomavirus ( hpv ) infection and to measure cytokine levels in endocervical secretions of women with bacterial vaginosis ( bv ) or hpv . 173 women ( 1648 years old ) were enrolled and divided into groups : bv , hpv , and controls . microbiological culture and vaginal ph were measured .
bt: To verify the relationship between vaginal pH and human papillomavirus (HPV) infection and to measure the levels of cytokines in the endocervical secretions of women with bacterial vaginosis (bv) or hpv , triglyceride levels in women with bv were also included. 173 women (aged 1648 years) were enrolled and divided into groups: bv , hpv and controls.

src: objective(s):ethnopharmacological field surveys demonstrated that many plants , such as gentiana olivieri , helichrysum graveolens , helichrysum plicatum ssp . plicatum , juniperus oxycedrus ssp . oxycedrus , juniperus communis var .
bt: Objectives (s): field studies of ethnopharmacologists have shown that many plants, such as gentiana olivieri, helichrysum graveolens, helichrysum plicatum ssp. plicatum, juniperus oxycedrus ssp. oxycedrus, juniperus communis var., present significant antibacterial properties.

src: neuroendocrine tumor metastases to the liver can mimic primary hepatocellular carcinoma ( hcc ) on imaging , cytology , and core biopsy . we present a case study along with the literature review of a patient who presented as a solitary liver mass mimicking hcc and subsequently underwent a partial hepatectomy . the histopathology and immunohistochemisrty of the resected specimen revealed metastatic neuroendocrine carcinoma .
bt: Metastases of neuroendocrine tumors in the liver can mimic primary hepatocellular carcinoma (hcc) in imaging, cytology and nucleus biopsy.We present a case study together with a review of the literature of a patient who was presented as a solitary liver mass mimicking hcc and subsequently subjected to a portion of hepatectomy and showed gastrointestinal symptoms.

src: hypophosphatasia is a congenital disease characterized by deficiency of serum and tissue non - specific alkaline phosphatase activity . the disease occurs due to mutations in the liver / bone / kidney alkaline phosphatase gene . six clinical forms of hypophosphatasia are recognized .
bt: Hypophosphatosis is a congenital disease characterized by a lack of alkaline activity of non-specific alcelic phosphatase of the liver and tissues.The disease occurs due to mutations in the hepatic/osseo/renal alkaline phosphatase gene.Six clinical forms of hypophosphatosis are recognized and these significantly influence bone development.

src: misclassification of bmi categories was assessed by weighted cohen s kappa and bland altman plot.resultson average , the two measurements were taken 8 months apart , and self - reported weight increased by 0.6 kg ( p<0.05 ) , and bmi by 0.2 kg / m2 ( p<0.05 ) . the distribution of bmi categories did not differ between self - reported and measured values . there was substantial agreement between self - reported values and those measured by medical staff ( weighted kappa 0.73 ) .
bt: The wrong classification of the bmi categories was assessed using the weighted weight of the cohen s kappa and the plot altman bland.The results, on average, were taken eight months apart, and the self-relevant weight increased by 0.6 kg (p<0.05) and the self-relevant weight by 0.2 kg/m2 (p<0.05).

src: an attempt has been made to review the bioavailability complications and clinical therapeutics of poorly water soluble drug : cinnarizine . the interest of writing this paper is to summarize the pharmacokinetic limitations of drug with special focus on strategies to improvise bioavailability along with effectiveness of novel dosage forms to circumvent the obstacle . the paper provides insight to the approaches to overcome low and erratic bioavailability of cinnarizine by cyclodextrin complexes and novel dosage forms : self - nanoemulsifying systems and buoyant microparticulates .
bt: The purpose of this article is to summarize the pharmacokinetic limitations of the drug, with particular attention to strategies to improve bioavailability along with the effectiveness of new dosage forms to bypass the obstacle and reduce treatment costs.The paper provides information on methods to overcome the low and incorrect bioavailability of cinnarizine and cyclodestrinosis and new dosage forms: auto-nanoemulsific systems and floating microparticles.

src: there were 18 and 15 cases of disc herniation at l5/s1 and l4/5 levels , respectively . four weeks following the procedure , 13 patients reported improvement in symptoms , and 14 remained symptomatically the same and subsequently had open microdiscectomy.nucleoplasty has been shown to be a safe and minimal - access procedure . less than half of our selected cohort of patients reported symptomatic improvement at 1-month follow - up .
bt: There were 18 and 15 cases of hernia at the levels of l5/s1 and l4/5 respectively, and four weeks after the procedure, 13 patients reported improvements in symptoms, and 14 were symptomatically left with the same and subsequently had a microdiscectomy.Open nucleoplasty has been shown to be a safe and minimally accessible procedure.Less than half of our selected cohort of patients reported symptomatic improvement at 1 month of follow-up.

src: in the present study , the antioxidant activity of successive leaf extracts of dracaena reflexa was investigated using the scavenging activity on 1,1-diphenyl-2-picrylhydrazyl and reducing power by ferric reducing antioxidant power assay . methanol extract was found potent in both the assays . ic50 values of 1,1-diphenyl-2-picrylhydrazyl assay for methanol extract was 0.97 mg / ml and ferric reducing antioxidant power value for the same is 1.19 .
bt: In the present study, the antioxidant activity of successive dracaena reflex leaf extracts was studied using the scavenging activity of 1,1-diphenyl-2-picrylhydrazyl and reducing potency by reducing iron to reduce antioxidant potency.Moreover, acetone extract was found to be potent in both trials.The ic50 values of 1,1-diphenyl-2-picrylhydrazyl for acetone extract were 0.97 mg/ml and the reducing antioxidant potency value for the same was 1.19.

src: in the absence of fresh frozen tissue for if , immunohistochemistry with c4d aids in the diagnosis.a total 48 cases of mn diagnosed on renal biopsy were analyzed . the formalin fixed paraffin embedded tissues were stained with routine hematoxylin and eosin stains along with periodic acid - schiff and silver methenamine stains to highlight the basement membrane . fresh frozen tissues were available for if in 40 cases .
bt: In the absence of fresh frozen tissues per se, immunohistochemical and c4d aids in diagnosis, a total of 48 cases were analyzed in renal biopsy.The incorporated tissues of paraffin fixed formelina were stained with routine stains of hemooxycin and eosin along with periodic stains of silver methylene and silver to confirm the subterranean membrane and the microvascular structure.

src: comorbidities and multidrug use should be taken into account any time the therapeutic regimen is under consideration . different classes of antifungal drugs are available for the treatment of invasive fungal infections but echinocandins , apart from their activity against resistant strains ( candida glabrata and candida krusei ) , seem to be safe , with limited adverse events and minimal drug drug interactions in comparison to the other regimens . therefore , these agents are strongly recommended when dealing with elderly patients suffering from an invasive form of candida infection .
bt: The comorbidity and use of different medications should be taken into account whenever the therapeutic regimen is considered.There are different classes of antifungal medications for the treatment of invasive fungal infections, but echinocandins, in addition to their activity against resistant strains (candida glabrata and candida cruzei), seem to be safe, with limited adverse effects and minimal pharmacological interactions compared to other regimens.

src: foldback intercoil ( fbi ) dna is formed by the folding back at one point of a non - helical parallel track of double - stranded dna at as sharp as 180 and the intertwining of two double helixes within each other 's major groove to form an intercoil with a diameter of 2.2 nm . fbi dna has been suggested to mediate intra - molecular homologous recombination of a deletion and inversion . inter - molecular homologous recombination , known as site - specific insertion , on the other hand , is mediated by the direct perpendicular approach of the fbi dna tip , as the attp site , onto the target dna , as the attb site .
bt: The resting (fbi) DNA intercoil is formed by folding a parallel non-helial path of double-layer DNA to an acute point of 180 and by intersecting two double-helial paths within the main groove one of the other to form an intercoil with a diameter of 2.2 nm. Fbi DNA has been suggested by mediation to the homologous intra-molecular recombination of a deletion and inversion, but has not been scientifically proven.

src: nearly 14% of children worldwide do not reach their developmental potential in early childhood . the early identification of delays in achieving milestones is critical . the world health organization ( who ) has developed normal age ranges for the achievement of motor milestones by healthy children .
bt: Almost 14% of children worldwide do not reach their developmental potential in early childhood.The precise identification of delays in reaching the motor pillars is fundamental.The World Health Organization (WHO) has developed normal age intervals for healthy children to reach motor pillars, as indicated by recent guidelines.

src: bifid condyle is a rare anatomic variation of mandibular condyle . it can be symptomatic or diagnosed incidentally on routine radiographic examination . no definite etiologic factor has been identified .
bt: Condal bifida is a rare anatomical variation of the mandibular condale.It can be symptomatic or diagnosed incidentally during a routine X-ray examination.No definite etiological factor has been identified and may influence chewing.

src: there were no significant differences between normal and pseudophakic eyes among subjects aged 5069 ( p > 0.05 ) . among subjects aged 7079 , pseudophakic eyes showed improved simulated va ( p = 0.000 ) and objective scattering index values ( p = 0.008 ) . patients with intraocular lenses have similar or superior visual function when compared to those with normal eyes at 26 months after cataract surgery , even under low - contrast conditions .
bt: There were no significant differences between normal and pseudofascular eyes in subjects aged 50-69 years (p > 0,05).Among subjects aged 70-79 years, pseudofascular eyes showed an improvement in the value of the simulated valve (p = 0,000) and the objective dispersion index (p = 0,008).Patients with intraocular lenses had a visual function similar to or greater than those with normal eyes 26 months after cataract surgery, even in low-contrast conditions.

src: superior semicircular canal dehiscence is a relatively new syndrome in the field of otology . it is of unknown etiology presenting with a variety of vestibular and auditory symptoms and radiologic findings play a crucial role in its diagnosis . cone beam computed tomography has been shown to be a powerful tool in the field of otolaryngology .
bt: The dehiscencia of the semicircular canal is a relatively new syndrome in the field of otology.It is of unknown etiology and presents a variety of vestibular and auditory symptoms, including vertigo and tinnitus, and radiological results play a crucial role in its diagnosis.Computerised tomography a fascio di cono has been shown to be a powerful tool in the field of otolaryngology.

src: the scores were recorded and compared within and between groups pre - treatment , immediately post - treatment , and 3 months post - treatment . [ results ] intra- and intergroup comparisons immediately and 3 months post - treatment showed extracorporeal shock wave therapy decreased pain to a significantly greater extent than ultrasound therapy . [ conclusion ] extracorporeal shock wave therapy can significantly reduce pain in patients with chronic tennis elbow .
bt: Scores were recorded and compared within and between pre-treatment, immediately post-treatment and 3 months post-treatment groups.[ results ] Comparisons between immediate intra-group and 3 months post-treatment showed that therapy with extracorporeal urethra significantly reduced pain more than ultrasound therapy.[ conclusion] Extracorporeal urethra therapy can significantly reduce pain in patients with chronic tennis knee pain.

src: the positive and negative syndrome scale ( panss ) was applied to assess the psychotic symptoms and aggression risk at baseline , week 2 , 4 , and 6 of the study.the results of this study showed that both protocols significantly decreased the scores on all subscales of the panss and supplemental aggression risk subscale as well as panss total score over the study . however , this improvement was significantly higher in zn sulfate receiving group compared to the placebo group . no major clinical side - effects were detected.it may be concluded that zn is an effective adjuvant agent in the management of patients with schizophrenia .
bt: The positive and negative syndrome (pans) scale was applied to assess psychotic symptoms and the risk of aggression at the starting point, week 2, 4 and 6 of the study.The results of this study showed that both protocols significantly reduced scores on all sub-scales of the panes and the sub-scale of risk of additional aggression as well as the total score of the panes during the study.However, this improvement was significantly greater in the group that received sulfate than in the placebo group.No significant clinical side effects were observed.It can be concluded that it is an effective adjuvant agent in the management of patients with schizophrenia.

src: the written information contained in the accident reports pertaining to contextual and technical elements were used.the study used multiple case qualitative content analysis . this descriptive study was based on the content analysis of the 788 reports from the commission de la sant et de la scurit du travail du qubec [ workers compensation board ( wcb ) ] investigating the fatal work - related accidents between 1990 and 2005 . the study was descriptive ( number and percentages ) .
bt: This descriptive study is based on the content analysis of 788 reports by the commission de la sant et de la scurit du travail du qubec (committee on workers' compensation) investigating fatal incidents at work between 1990 and 2005.The study was descriptive (number and percentage), and included an analysis of the main causes of incidents.

src: functional gastrointestinal disorder ( fgid ) is one of the commonest digestive diseases worldwide and leads to significant morbidity and burden on healthcare resource . the putative bio - psycho - social pathophysiological model for fgid underscores the importance of psychological distress in the pathogenesis of fgid . concomitant psychological disorders , notably anxiety and depressive disorders , are strongly associated with fgid and these psychological co - morbidities correlate with severity of fgid symptoms .
bt: The bio-psycho-social pathophysiological model for fgid emphasizes the importance of psychological stress in the pathogenesis of fgid.Concomitant psychological disorders, particularly anxiety and depressive disorders, are strongly associated with fgid and these psychological co-morbidities correlate with the severity of fgid symptoms and with the use of antidepressant medications.

src: chest pain is a rare sign of thoracal endometriosis associated with endometrioma of the tubo - ovarian endometrioma . we report the case periodic episodes of chest pain concurrent with menstruation in a 35-year - old female , in which ovarian endometrioma was diagnosed and left - sided oophorectomy was performed . after surgery , patient underwent medical treatment which included a gn - rh agonist and a combined oral contraceptive .
bt: Chest pain is a rare sign of chest endometriosis associated with tube endometriosis - ovarian endometriosis.For example, there were periodic episodes of chest pain that accompanied menstruation in a 35-year-old woman, where an ovarian endometriosis was diagnosed and left-sided oftalmotherapy was performed.After surgery, the patient underwent medical treatment that included a rhonist and a combined oral contraceptive.

src: the clinical experience was a total of 12 weeks . groups were compared according to several variables including second semester exam scores , hesi scores , and quality and timeliness of clinical paperwork . over a two - year period , seventy - one undergraduate nursing students in the second semester medical - surgical nursing course participated .
bt: The clinical experience was a total of 12 weeks, and the groups were compared according to various variables including second-semester exam scores, hesy scores and the quality and timeliness of clinical documentation.Over a two-year period, seventy-one university nursing students from the second-semester medical-surgical nursing course were involved, and a significant improvement in patient management was observed.

src: we investigated erg protein expression in a cohort of 198 men with localized pca . erg expression was correlated with patients ' clinical outcome and several pathological parameters , including gleason score ( gs ) , pathological stage , surgical margin , and extra - capsular extension . erg expression was detected in 86/198 ( 43.4% ) patients exclusively in neoplastic epithelium .
bt: We studied the expression of the erg protein in a cohort of 198 men with localized pca.Erg expression was correlated with the clinical outcome of patients and various pathological parameters, including Gleason score (GS), pathological stage, surgical margin, extra-capsular extension and family history.Erg expression was detected in 86/198 (43.4%) patients exclusively in the neoplastic epithelium.

src: type ii acots fall into the ' hot dog ' fold superfamily . there are currently six human type ii genes ; however , two homologous proteins , thioesterase superfamily members 4 ( them4 ) and 5 ( them5 ) share common type ii structural features and , in the case of them4 , acyl - coa thioesterase activity -- suggesting that the family may be larger than previously realised . although recent studies have greatly expanded the current understanding of these proteins and their physiological importance , there are a number of members whose functions are relatively unexplored and which warrant further investigation .
bt: I acotti II belong to the superfamily of double-ray caldi canines.There are currently six human type II genes; however, two homologous proteins, the members of the thioesterase superfamily of type 4 (them4) and 5 (them5), share common structural characteristics of type II and, in the case of type II4, the activity of acyl-coa thioesterase - suggesting that the family could be larger than it previously realized and also include members of type I.

src: objectiveserine - threonine kinase stk11 catalyzes the amp - activated protein kinase complex . we tested the hypothesis that a gene variant in stk11 contributes to variation in insulin sensitivity and metformin efficacy.research design and methodswe studied the effects of a single nucleotide polymorphism ( snp ) ( rs8111699 ) in stk11 on endocrine - metabolic and body composition indexes before and after 1 year of metformin in 85 hyperinsulinemic girls with androgen excess , representing a continuum from prepuberal girls with a combined history of low birth weight and precocious pubarche over to postmenarchial girls with hyperinsulinemic ovarian hyperandrogenism . metformin was dosed at 425 mg / day in younger girls and 850 mg / day in older girls .
bt: Our research objectives are to study the effects of a single nucleotide polymorphism (snp) (rs8111699) in paragraph11 on endocrine - metabolic and body composition before and after a year of metformin in 85 hyperinsulinemic androgen-excess girls, and their psychological reactions, which represent a continuum of prepubescent girls with a combined history of low birth weight and early puberty versus postmenarchial girls with ovarian hyperinsulinemia.

src: development of novel biomaterials for drug delivery which forms a part of the so called novel drug delivery systems has always been exhilarating . mechanical evaluation of polymer based topical gels , which would be subjected to load or stress during its application , is inevitable.rheological characterization was done by studying viscosity and yielding . rheological modeling was also carried out.the viscosity and yield stress were inversely dependent on the eugenol concentration .
bt: The development of new biomaterials for drug delivery that are part of the so-called new drug delivery systems has always been exciting.The mechanical evaluation of topical polymer-based gels, which would have been subjected to load or stress during their application, is inevitable.The rheological characterization was done by studying viscosity and yield.A rheological modeling was also carried out.Viscosity and yield stress were inversely dependent on the concentration of eugenol and influenced the duration of drug release.

src: parasite lactate dehydrogenase ( pldh ) is extensively employed as malaria rapid diagnostic tests ( rdts ) . moreover , it is a well - known drug target candidate . however , the genetic diversity of this gene might influence performance of rdt kits and its drug target candidacy .
bt: The lattato-dehydrogenase parasite (pldh) is widely used as a rapid diagnostic test for malaria (rdts) and is also a known target candidate for drug targets, however, the genetic diversity of this gene could influence the performance of the rdt kit and its target candidate for drug targets and the need for further studies.

src: beryllium was released into the air from routine operations and three accidental fires at the rocky flats plant ( rfp ) in colorado from 1958 to 1989 . we evaluated environmental monitoring data and developed estimates of airborne concentrations and their uncertainties and calculated lifetime cancer risks and risks of chronic beryllium disease to hypothetical receptors . this article discusses exposure - response relationships for lung cancer and chronic beryllium disease .
bt: Il berillio was released in the area of routine operations and three accidental fires at the rocky flats plant (rfp) in colorado from 1958 to 1989. we evaluated environmental monitoring data and developed estimates of concentrations and their exposure to the relationship between lung cancer and berillium chronic disease.

bt: In addition, all peeling areas documented in video on the retina surface were evaluated postoperatively using additional focal microperimetry 2.The sensitivity of the retina and the bcva are correlated with morphological changes (e.g. elm) in the foveal region and peeling regions of the membrane.In total, the bcva increased from 0.6 (0.2) to 0.9 (0.3) logmar after 6 months with an increase in the sensitivity of the retina (17.9 2.7 db to 26.8 3.1 db, p < 0,01).

src: 45 male c57bl/6j mice ( mean weight 27 g ) were anesthetized with ketamine / xylazine . animals were subjected to a weight drop closed traumatic brain injury ( wd - tbi ) , a femoral fracture and hemorrhagic shock ( fx - sh ) . animals were subdivided into wd - tbi , fx - sh and combined trauma ( co - tx ) groups .
bt: Topical maschi c57bl/6j (mean weight 27 g) were anesthetized with ketamine/xilasiene.The animals were subjected to a closed-weight trauma trauma (fx-sh), a femoral fracture and hemorrhagic shock (fx-sh).The animals were divided into groups of combined trauma (co-sh), combined trauma (wd-tbi), combined trauma (fx-sh), and combined trauma (hemocratic shock).

src: objectivea review of the literature on coccygectomy and our patients was performed to assess the effectiveness of coccygectomy for chronic refractory coccygodynia.methodsan english language pubmed search was conducted with the terms " coccygodynia " and " coccygectomy " from january 1980 to january 2012 . we retrospectively reviewed the medical records and performed telephone questionnaire on 61 patients who underwent coccygectomy at ucdmc between 1997 and 2009.resultsthere were 28 case series from 1980 to 2012 for a total of 742 patients who underwent coccygectomy following failed conservative management . the mean age ranged from 26.4 to 52.8 years .
bt: Objective research in English was conducted with the terms "coccygodynia" and "coccygectomy" from January 1980 to January 2012.We retrospectively reviewed medical records and conducted a telephone questionnaire of 61 patients who had coccygectomy at UCDMC between 1997 and 2009.The results were 28 series of cases from 1980 to 2012 for a total of 742 patients who had sub-species.

src: in the study area , pentachlorophenol and pentachlorophenol incineration sources have been identified , and the animal contamination and blood elevations probably reflect these sources . soil reference values and site - specific risk assessments should include estimates of exposures to contamination in home - produced animal products . such estimates can be verified with limited pcdd / pcdf sampling of animals and humans.imagesfigure 1figure 2
bt: In the study area, sources of incineration of pentachlorophenolic and pentachlorophenolic compounds have been identified, and animal contamination and high blood levels are likely reflected by these sources.Soil reference values and site-specific risk assessments should include estimates of exposure to contamination in pet products and in breast milk.These estimates can be verified with a limited sample of animals and humans.

src: resistance to fluoroquinolones ( flq ) and second - line injectable drugs ( slid ) is steadily increasing , especially in eastern european countries , posing a serious threat to effective tuberculosis ( tb ) infection control and adequate patient management . the availability of rapid molecular tests for the detection of extensively drug - resistant tb ( xdr - tb ) is critical in areas with high rates of multidrug - resistant tb ( mdr - tb ) and xdr - tb and limited conventional drug susceptibility testing ( dst ) capacity . we conducted a multicenter study to evaluate the performance of the new version ( v2.0 ) of the genotype mtbdrsl assay compared to phenotypic dst and sequencing on a panel of 228 mycobacterium tuberculosis isolates and 231 smear - positive clinical specimens .
bt: The availability of rapid molecular tests for the detection of drug-resistant tuberculosis (xdr-TB) is critical in areas with high rates of drug-resistant tuberculosis ( mdr-TB) and xdr-TB and limited capacity for conventional drug sensitization testing (dst).We conducted a multicenter study to evaluate the positive performance of the new version (v2.0) of the genotype mtrsl assay versus phenotypic ones by sequencing 228 isolated mycobacterial tuberculosis samples and 231 clinical smalto samples on a panel and obtained significant results.

src: we report the rare case of an 83-year - old caucasian male affected by a giant cholesteatoma that eroded the labyrinth and the posterior fossa dura and extended to the infralabyrinthine region , going beyond the theca and reaching the first cervical vertebra . the giant cholesteatoma was managed through a combined approach ( microscopic and , subsequently , complementary endoscopic approach ) . in this case report , we illustrate some advantages of this surgical choice .
bt: The rare case of an 83-year-old Caucasian male being struck by a colossal colostomy that erodes the labyrinth and the hard posterior fossa and extends to the infralabyrinth region, overtaking the teca and reaching the first cervical vertebrae, reports The colossal colostomy was managed through a combined approach (microscopic and, subsequently, complementary endoscopic) and has caused permanent damage to the whole ear.

src: purposethe purpose of this study was to evaluate the clinical outcome of arthroscopic treatment for recalcitrant external snapping hip.materials and methodsbetween september 2011 and june 2013 , we evaluated 7 patients ( 10 cases ) with snapping hip who were refractory to conservative treatments for at least 3 months . two patients ( 4 cases ) were impossible to adduct both knees in 90of hip flexion . surgery was done in lateral decubitus position , under spinal anesthesia .
bt: The purpose of this study was to evaluate the clinical outcome of arthroscopic treatment for materials and methods of recalcitrant external hip interception between September 2011 and June 2013, we evaluated 7 patients (10 cases) with hip interception who were refractory to conservative treatments for at least 3 months.

src: introductiondiagnosis of peritoneal tuberculosis ( ptb ) is difficult , even in developed countries , where data are lacking . the aim of the present study was to describe the clinical presentation , diagnosis , and bacterial epidemiology of ptb in france over a 10-year period.methodsa retrospective study was conducted on ptb in two university hospitals in france , between january 2004 and december 2014.resultsamong the 34 patients , 76.5% were migrants from areas of endemic tuberculosis ( tb ) , mainly africa . the main presentation ( 85.3% ) was a checkup of ascites or suspicion of peritoneal carcinomatosis .
bt: The introduction of a diagnosis of peritoneal tuberculosis (PTB) is difficult, even in developed countries, where data is lacking.The objective of this study was to describe the clinical presentation, diagnosis and bacterial epidemiology of peritoneal tuberculosis (PTB) in France over a 10-year period.This retrospective study was conducted on ptb in two university hospitals in France, between January 2004 and December 2014.

src: six months later , due to persistence of symptoms , the patient underwent a high resolution esophageal manometry ( hrem ) demonstrating jackhammer esophagus . the patient was treated with a high dose proton pump inhibitor but without resolution of her symptoms . during the last year , the patient reported repeated episodes of food regurgitation and a significant weight loss .
bt: Six months later, due to the persistence of symptoms, the patient underwent a high-resolution esophageal manometry (HREM) that demonstrated the jackhammer esophagus.The patient was treated with a high-dose proton pump inhibitor but without resolving her symptoms.During the last year, the patient reported repeated episodes of regurgitation and significant weight loss, even after following a strict diet.

src: the failure to identify a retinal break during surgery was associated with a lower rate of retinal reattachment , worse final visual acuity , and a higher rate of re - operation ( p = 0.002 , p = 0.02 , and p = 0.002 , respectively ) . the location of the identified retinal break was more common in the superotemporal quadrant than in the other quadrants.conclusionsthe inability to identify a retinal break during surgery was associated with a poor final outcome . other factors were less important for the functional and anatomic success in patients with pseudophakic rds .
bt: The lack of identification of a retinal rupture during surgery was associated with a lower rate of retinal reattachment, a worse final visual acuity and a higher rate of reoperation (p = 0.002, p = 0.02 and p = 0.002, respectively).The location of the identified retinal rupture was more common in the supertemporal quadrant than in other quadrants.Conclusions: The inability to identify a retinal rupture during surgery was associated with a poor final result.Other factors were less important for functional and anatomical success in patients with pseudopathic retinopathy.

src: we reviewed a cohort of patients with previously untreated locoregional advanced head and neck squamous cell carcinoma ( hnscc ) who received a uniform chemoradiotherapy regimen . retrospective review was performed of 105 patients with stage iii or iv hnscc treated at greater baltimore medical center from 2000 to 2007 . radiation included 125 cgy twice daily for a total 70 gy to the primary site .
bt: We examined a cohort of patients with advanced locoregional test and neck squamous cell carcinoma (hnscc) who had not previously been treated with a uniform chimoradiotherapeutic regimen, and conducted a retrospective review of 105 patients with stage iii or iv hnscc at Greater Baltimore Medical Center from 2000 to 2007, including 125 cgy twice daily for a total of 70 gy at the primary site, and caused significant side effects.

src: liver metastases from colorectal carcinoma commonly form nodular lesions in the liver parenchyma . we report a case of liver metastasis from rectal adenocarcinoma that extended predominantly into the bile duct . a 62-year - old japanese man underwent low anterior resection for rectal adenocarcinoma 9 years ago .
bt: The hepatic metastasis of corretto carcinoma usually forms nodal lesions in the parenchima hepatica.We have reported a case of hepatic metastasis of adenocarcinoma rettale that extends predominantly in the bile duct.A 62-year-old Japanese man underwent a low anterior resection for adenocarcinoma rettale 9 years ago and also had gastrointestinal symptoms.

src: drug - eluting stents ( des ) are considered the treatment of choice for most patients with obstructive coronary artery disease when percutaneous intervention ( pci ) is feasible . however , stent thrombosis seems to occur more frequently with des and occasionally is associated with resistance to anti - platelet drugs . we have experienced a case of recurrent stent thrombosis in a patient with clopidogrel resistance .
bt: - eluting stents (des) are considered the treatment of choice for most patients with obstructive coronary disease when a percutaneous procedure (PCI) is feasible. however, stent thrombosis appears to occur more frequently with des and occasionally is associated with resistance to anti-piastronetic drugs, although this is not always easily detectable clinically. we have experienced a case of recurrent stent thrombosis in a patient with clopidogrel resistance.

bt: The mean change in hemoglobin level for 15 patients who completed at least nine treatments was 1.7 g/dL (median, 1.1 g/dL; gamma, 1.9 g/dL to 3.2 g/dL); it reached 2.1 g/dL (median, 1.3 g/dL; gamma, 0,2 g/dL to 4.6 g/dL; p = 0.0007) for 14 patients who completed all 12 treatments.

src: overall 86.9% of respondents felt that the proposed hierarchical nature of injuries was appropriate , and 77.8% of respondents agreed that that the risk of neurologic injury is highest in a vertical fracture through the foramen . almost 80% of respondents felt that the separation of injuries based on the integrity of l5s1 facet was appropriate , and 83.8% of surgeons agreed that a nondisplaced sacral u fracture is a clinically relevant entity . conclusion this study determines the global perspective on controversial areas in the injury patterns of sacral fractures and demonstrates that the development of a comprehensive and universally accepted sacral classification is possible .
bt: In general, 86.9% of respondents believe that the proposed hierarchical nature of injury is appropriate, and 77.8% of respondents agree that the risk of neurological injury is higher in a vertical fracture through the foramen.Nearly 80% of respondents believe that the separation of lesions based on the integrity of the l5s1 side is appropriate, and 83.8% of surgeons believe that a non-dislocated sacral fracture is a clinically relevant entity.This study determines the overall perspective on the controversial areas in the models of sacral fracture injuries and shows that it is possible to develop a classification.

bt: The metsy was defined according to the National Cholesterol Education Program and the third panel of adult treatment, and all probable predictive models and their predictive performance were provided using congedo-one-out cross-validated logistic regression and the curve methods characteristic of the recipient's operation, but not all patients responded positively to these methods.

src: fundamental problems with personality disorders ( pd ) diagnostic system in the previous version of dsm , led to the revision of dsm . therefore , a multidimensional system has been proposed for diagnosis of personality disorder features in dsm-5 . in the dimensional approach of dsm-5 , personality disorders diagnosis is based on levels of personality functioning ( criteria a ) and personality trait domains ( criteria b).the purpose of this study was firstly , to examine the dsm-5 levels of personality functioning in antisocial and borderline personality disorders , and second , to explore which levels of personality functioning in patients with antisocial and borderline personality disorders can better predicted severity than others.this study had a cross sectional design .
bt: The fundamental problems with the DSM diagnostic system (pd) in the previous version of dsm led to the revision of dsm. Therefore, a multidimensional system for diagnosing the characteristics of DSM-5 was proposed.In the DSM-5 dimensional approach, the diagnosis of personality disorders is based on levels of personality function (criteria a) and domains of personality traits (criteria b).The purpose of this study was, first, to examine the levels of dsm-5 function in patients with antisocial borderline personality disorders, and, second, to explore what levels of personality function in patients.

src: chromosome 22q13.3 deletion syndrome is a well - recognized cause of global developmental delay , while duplication of the same chromosome is a rare occurrence . the presence of both abnormalities in the same family has never been reported , to our knowledge . we report a rare occurrence of 22q13.3 duplication and 22q13.3 deletion in siblings , as a consequence of a mother 's inversion on her 22nd chromosome ( p13;q13.32 ) .
bt: The syndrome of chromosome deletion 22q13.3 is a well-known cause of delayed global development, while the duplication of the same chromosome is a rare occurrence.The presence of both abnormalities in the same family has never been reported, to our knowledge.We are reporting a rare occurrence of 22q13.3 duplication and 22q13.3 deletion in siblings, as a result of a mother's inversion on her 22 chromosome (p13;q13.32), and this case shows an interesting pattern of heredity.

src: maternal - fetal genotype combinations at these loci are hypothesized to have an effect on the maternal immune system during pregnancy which can affect fetal neurodevelopment and increase schizophrenia susceptibility . this article reviews maternal - fetal genotype incompatibility studies and schizophrenia and discusses the hypothesized biological role of these incompatibility genes . it concludes that research is needed to further elucidate the role of rhd and hla - b maternal - fetal genotype incompatibility in schizophrenia and to identify other genes that produce an adverse prenatal environment through a maternal - fetal genotype incompatibility mechanism .
bt: It is hypothesized that maternal-fetal genotypes in these locations have an effect on the maternal immune system during pregnancy that may influence fetal neurodevelopment and increase sensitivity to schizophrenia.This article reviews studies of maternal-fetal genotypes incompatibility with schizophrenia and discusses the hypothetical biological role of these incompatibility genes.It concludes that research is needed to further clarify the role of rhd e-b maternal-fetal genotypes incompatibility in schizophrenia and to identify other genes that produce an adverse prenatal environment through a mechanism of maternal-fetal genotypes incompatibility.

src: the aim of this study was to evaluate clinical characteristics , prognostic factors , survival rates , and treatment modalities in patients with primary gastric lymphoma ( pgl ) . we retrospectively reviewed and analyzed data from patients treated for pgl in our clinic from 1998 through 2010 . staging was performed using the lugano staging system .
bt: The purpose of this study was to evaluate clinical features, prognostic factors, survival rates and treatment patterns in patients with primary gastric lymphoma (PGL).We reviewed and analyzed retrospectively the data of patients treated for LGP in our clinic from 1998 to 2010.

bt: Symptomatic trigeminal neuralgia due to a brainstem infarction is said to be rare, however, facial pain is not uncommon in Wallenberg syndrome.Facial pain related to Wallenberg syndrome can be persistent or intermittent, and occasional occurs in brief attacks, regardless of the patient's gender.

src: the factors affecting the correlation between parkinson disease ( pd ) and depression have remained unclear.we assessed the prevalence of depression among patients with pd and the association between pd - related variables and depression severity.this is a cross - sectional study performed in kermanshah province of iran . sampling was based on recruitment of subjects according to inclusion and exclusion criteria . patients with confirmed parkinson disease who were referred to clinics of kermanshah university of medical sciences participated in this study .
bt: The factors influencing the correlation between Parkinson's disease (PD) and depression remain unclear.We assessed the prevalence of depression among PD patients and the association between PD-related variables and the severity of depression.This is a cross-sectional study conducted in the province of Kermanshah in Iran.The sampling was based on recruiting subjects according to inclusion and exclusion criteria and their age.

bt: The detection of unknown variants in heterogeneous samples depends on a fluorimetric analysis of signal intensity based on the principle that homosigotide samples generate twice the amount of signal.This method can identify unknown SNPs under heterogeneous conditions with a sensitivity of 82% and a specificity of 90%.

src: american trypanosomiasis or chagas disease is a debilitating disease representing an important social problem that affects , approximately , 10 million people in the world . the main aggravating factor of this situation is the lack of an effective drug to treat the different stages of this disease . in this context , the search for trypanocidal substances isolated from plants , synthetic or semi synthetic molecules , is an important strategy .
bt: Trypanosomiasis or Chagas disease is a debilitating American disease that represents a major social problem affecting about 10 million people worldwide.The use of existing drugs, the main aggravating factor of this situation, is the lack of an effective drug to treat the various stages of this disease.In this context, the search for trypanocidal substances isolated from plants, synthetic or semisynthetic molecules, is an important strategy.

src: triatoma brasiliensis sensu lato ( s.l . ) , the main vector of chagas disease in northeastern brazil , is a species complex comprising four species , one with two subspecies ( t. brasiliensis brasiliensis , t. brasiliensis macromelasoma , t. juazeirensis , t. sherlocki , and t. melanica ) , and each taxon displaying distinct ecological requirements . in order to evaluate the genetic relationships among nine t. brasiliensis s.l .
bt: Triatoma brasiliensis sensu lato (s.l. ), the main vector of Chagas disease in northeastern Brazil, is a species complex composed of four species, one with two subspecies (t. brasiliensis brasiliensis, t. brasiliensis macromelasoma, t. juazeirensis, t. sherlocki and t. melanica), and each taxon with distinct ecological requirements and specific geographical distribution.

src: skin - lightening is an aesthetic practice of global concern . by adopting a biopsycho - social approach , we consider the interplay between the biological , psychological and social factors that underpin the circulation and consumption of skin lighteners in south africa . this paper reflects on biological aspects of skin lightening , interpersonal relationships , individual beliefs and expectations about the maintenance of health and well being that informs cosmetic practices .
bt: Skin briqueting is an aesthetic practice of global concern. adopting a biopsycho-social approach, we consider the interaction between biological, psychological and social factors that support the circulation and consumption of skin briqueting in South Africa.This paper reflects on the biological aspects of skin briqueting, interpersonal relationships, individual beliefs and expectations about health and well-being that inform cosmetic practices, and how these practices influence the mental health of the population.

src: similar codes were grouped into categories , and broader themes were developed from these categories . four themes were identified : social network and relationships ; interactions with agencies ; recognition of role ; and time for oneself . by identifying what affects carers ' quality of life , an appropriate choice can be made when selecting instruments for future carer research .
bt: The codes have been grouped into similar categories and broader themes have been developed from these categories.Four themes have been identified: social networking and relationships; interactions with agencies; role recognition; and time for itself.By identifying what influences caregivers' quality of life, an appropriate choice can be made when selecting tools for future caregiver research, and this can significantly improve the effectiveness of interviews.

src: pancreatic cell failure leads to diabetes development . during disease progression , cells adapt their secretory capacity to compensate the elevated glycaemia and the peripheral insulin resistance . this compensatory mechanism involves a fine - tuned regulation to modulate the endoplasmic reticulum ( er ) capacity and quality control to prevent unfolded proinsulin accumulation , a major protein synthetized within the cell .
bt: During disease progression, cells adapt their secretory capacity to compensate for high blood sugar and peripheral insulin resistance and decreased enzyme activity, and this compensatory mechanism involves fine-tuned regulation to modulate the capacity and quality control of the endoplasmic reticulum (ER) to prevent the buildup of proinsulin, one of the main proteins synthesized within the cell.

src: mitochondrial genomes often contain large amounts of plastid dna ( ptdna)-derived sequences ( mtpts ) . it has been suggested that the intercompartmental transfer of ptdna is greatly reduced in species with only a single plastid per cell ( monoplastidic ) as compared with those with many plastids per cell ( polyplastidic ) . this hypothesis has not been applied to the movement of dna from plastids to mitochondria .
bt: Mitochondrial genomes often contain large quantities of DNA-derived plastids (ptdna) sequences (mtpts).It has been suggested that the intercompartmental transfer of ptdna is significantly reduced in species with only one single plastids per cell (monoplastidical) compared to those with many plastids per cell (polyplastidical), but this does not occur in endosymbiotic species.

src: many research studies report the healing effects of aloe vera , thyroid hormone cream and silver sulfadiazine . however , the effects of these therapeutic agents are not well understood and have not been compared in one study . this study aimed at investigating the effects of topical application of an aloe vera gel , a thyroid hormone cream and a silver sulfadiazine cream on the healing of skin wounds surgically induced in wistar rats for determining the treatment of choice .
bt: Many research studies report the healing effects of aloe vera , thyroid hormone cream and silver sulfadiazine , however, the effects of these therapeutic agents are not well understood and have not been compared in a single study this study sought to investigate the effects of topical application of a gel of aloe vera , thyroid hormone cream and silver sulfadiazine cream on the healing of surgically induced skin wounds in the rat wistar to determine the treatment of choice. additionally, the results were evaluated in terms of reducing inflammation.

bt: Patients were evaluated clinically, x-rays and with Harris's spine score, sf36, and mactar questionnaires, with an average follow-up of 65 months (26 - 136).All v-t prosthetics had survived well. Otto di hg ii was reviewed for the last follow-up at 19 - 102 months.

src: a latent content analysis was used to explore the characteristics and dynamics of social and sexual relationships.resultswe found dominant masculine ideals characterised by overt economic power and multiple sexual partners . reasons for large concurrent sexual networks were the perception that women were too empowered , could not be trusted , and lack of control over women . existing masculine norms encourage concurrent sexual networks , ignoring the high risk of hiv transmission .
bt: An analysis of latent content has been used to explore the characteristics and dynamics of male ideals dominating their relationships and social relationships.The ideal characteristics of men are described as having economic power and multiple sexual partners.The reasons for the competition in the large sex network include the perception that women are overly responsible, unreliable, and lack of control over women.

bt: A higher level of this cytokine was also found in obese patients with t2 dm. A positive correlation was found between il-6 and tnf-concentrations. Only the level of il-6 correlated with the concentration of crp in serum.The study's conclusions confirmed that increased inflammatory cytokines lead to persistence of inflammation in obese subjects and this effect was more pronounced in patients with a high body mass index.

src: introductionthe spleen is a highly vascular organ and is in close proximity to many potential primary sites such as the stomach , breast , pancreas and colon . it is however an unusual site for metastatic disease . the reasons for this are not fully understood at the present time .
bt: The introduction of the spleen is a highly vascular organ and is in close proximity to many potential primary sites such as the stomach, breast, pancreas and colon, but it is an unusual site for metastatic disease, for which the reasons are not yet fully understood at this time and include genetic factors.

src: it is known that the brain adaptively recalibrates itself to small ( 100 ms ) auditory visual ( av ) temporal asynchronies so as to maintain intersensory temporal coherence . here we explored whether spatial disparity between a sound and light affects av temporal recalibration . participants were exposed to a train of asynchronous av stimulus pairs ( sound - first or light - first ) with sounds and lights emanating from either the same or a different location .
bt: It has been noted that the brain recalibrates itself adaptively to small (100 ms) temporal visual auditory (AV) signals to maintain intersensitive temporal coherence.We have explored whether the spatial disparity between sound and light influences the temporal recalibration.The participants were exposed to a train of pairs of synchronous av (sound - prima or light - prima) stimuli with sounds and lights emanating from the same or a different place and this significantly influenced the results of the experiment.

src: three - way anova was used to compare the factors implant length , crown height , and implant system ( = 0.05 ) . the results showed that implant length was a statistically significant factor for both axial and nonaxial loading . the 13 mm prosthetic crown did not result in statistically significant differences in stress distribution between the implant systems and implant lengths studied , regardless of load type ( p > 0.05 ) .
bt: The new tri-way was used to compare the factors of the length of the implant, the height of the crown and the implant system (p = 0,05).The results showed that the length of the implant was a statistically significant factor for both axial and non-axial load.The 13 mm protective crown did not result in a statistically significant difference in the distribution of stress between the implant systems and the length of the implants studied, regardless of the type of load (p > 0,05).

src: head and neck squamous cell carcinomas are among the most common neoplasms worldwide and characterized by local tumor aggressiveness , high rate of early recurrences , development of metastasis , and second primary cancers . despite modern therapeutic strategies and sophisticated surgical management , overall survival - rates remained largely unchanged over the last decades . thus , the need for novel treatment options for this tumor entity is undeniable .
bt: T-cell and cervical squamous cell carcinomas are among the most common tumors worldwide and are characterized by local tumor aggressiveness, high rates of premature recurrence, development of metastases and primary secondary tumors.Despite modern therapeutic strategies and sophisticated surgical management, overall survival rates have remained largely unchanged over the past few decades and this despite intensive palliative care.

bt: Finally, the formal sections - fisse and paraffin - incorporated from 15 normal donors (all autopsies) and 12 men with prostate cancer were analyzed with immunohistochemistry.About 40% of the normal prostate and tumor samples had positive spande results.The signals were exclusively inside the nucleus in normal prostate cells, while both nuclear and cytoplasmic positivity was observed in tumor cells and prostate stem cells.

src: in the latest year , and also in 2013 , salmonella was the most frequently detected causative agent in foodborne outbreaks ( fbos ) reported in europe . as indicated in efsa report ( 2015 ) the serotypes mostly associated to fbos are s. typhimurium and enteritidis ; while salmonella typhimurium is generally associated with the consumption of contaminated pork and beef , fbos due to salmonella enteritidis are linked to eggs and poultry meat . in this study it is described the investigation of a domestic fbo involving four adults and linked to homemade lasagne .
bt: In the last year, and even in 2013, salmonella has been the most frequently detected causative agent in the food epidemics (fbos) reported in Europe.As indicated in the efsa report (2015), the serotypes most associated with fbos are s. typhimurium e enteritidis; while salmonella typhimurium is generally associated with consumption of contaminated pork and beef, fbos due to salmonella enteritidis are related to eggs and poultry products.In this study, siagna describes the investigation of a domestic fbo involving four adults and related to homemade lasso.

bt: We developed a specific monoclonal antibody against the 6-oxo - m1dg and incorporated this antibody into a procedure for isolating the immunoaffection of the 6-oxo - m1dg from biological matrices.Moreover, the purified analyst quantified the lc - ms / ms using a stabilized analog of the isotope ([15n5]-6-oxo - m1dg) as the internal standard.Rats and dawley of male sprague have a 6-oxo - m1dg scrotum at a rate of 3501893 fmol / kgd in feces.

src: using 64-channel multidetector row computed tomographic angiography ( mdcta ) , we evaluated morphological features of the major systemic vessels in micropigs and compared our results to published human data . the main vasculature of the animals was similar to that of humans , except for the iliac arterial system . however , diameters of the major systemic vessels were significantly different between micropigs and humans .
bt: Using the 64-channel line of multi-detector computed tomography (MDCTA) scanners, we evaluated the morphological characteristics of the main systemic vessels in these micro-cinnons and compared our results with published human data.The main animal vasculature was similar to that of humans, except for the arterial system.However, the diameters of the main systemic vessels were significantly different between micro-cinnons and humans, regardless of the sex of the animals used.

bt: Noncode 2016 also introduced three important new features: (i) conservation annotation; (ii) the relationship between infections and diseases; and (iii) an interface to select high-quality data sets through predicted scores, literary support and support for sequencing along the reading path.

src: essential palatal tremor ( ept ) is a rare disorder which shows rhythmic involuntary movement of the muscles of soft palate , especially tensor veli palatini muscle . ept is classified by two subtypes , which is primary and secondary ept . secondary ept includes psychogenic type .
bt: Ept is classified by two subtypes, which are primary and secondary ept. Secondary ept includes the psychogenic type, and the chronic type.

src: atlantic correction equations were developed in the mhw subsample . using separate multiple regression models for men and women , self - reported body mass index ( bmi ) was corrected by multiplying the self - reported estimate by its corresponding model coefficient and adding the model intercept . paired t - tests were used to determine whether corrected mean bmi values were significantly more accurate ( i.e. , closer to measured data ) than the equivalent means based on self - reported data .
bt: Using multiple regression models separated for men and women, the self-relevant body mass index (BMI) was corrected by multiplying the self-relevant estimate with its corresponding model coefficient and adding the intersection of the model, but not taking into account the etheric variability.

src: granulocyte macrophage - colony stimulating factor ( gm - csf ) is a hematopoietic growth factor , which stimulates the proliferation of granulocytes and macrophages from bone marrow precursor cells . in autoimmune and inflammatory diseases , th17 cells have been considered as strong inducers of tissue inflammation . however , recent evidence indicates that gm - csf has prominent proinflammatory functions and that this growth factor ( not il-17 ) is critical for the pathogenicity of cd4 + t cells .
bt: Granulocyte macrophage - colony stimulating factor (gm - csf) is a hematopoietic growth factor, which stimulates the proliferation of granulocytes and macrophages from bone marrow precursor cells. in autoimmune and inflammatory diseases, th17 cells have been considered strong inducers of tissue inflammation. however, recent evidence indicates that gm - csf has important proinflammatory functions and that this growth factor (not il-17) is critical for the pathogenicity of cd4 + t cells and can aggravate disease progression.

src: the initial step of atrioventricular ( av ) valve development involves the deposition of extracellular matrix ( ecm ) components of the endocardial cushion and the endocardialmesenchymal transition . while the appropriately regulated expression of the major ecm components , versican and hyaluronan , that form the endocardial cushion is important for heart valve development , the underlying mechanism that regulates ecm gene expression remains unclear . we found that zebrafish crip2 expression is restricted to a subset of cells in the av canal ( avc ) endocardium at 55 hours post - fertilization ( hpf ) .
bt: While the adequately regulated expression of the main components of the ECM, versican and ialuronan, which form the endocardial cushion, is important for the development of the heart valve, the underlying mechanism that regulates the expression of the ECM gene remains uncertain.We found that the expression of zebrafish crip2 is limited to a subset of cells in the endocardial canal (avc) at 55 hours after fertilization (hpf) and this could directly affect the assembly of the endocardial cushion.

src: leonurus cardiaca , commonly known as motherwort , is a member of the lamiaceae family . it has a number of interesting biological activities , for example , sedative and hypotensive , antioxidant , anti - inflammatory , and antimicrobial activities . the aim of the present study was to investigate the effect of alcoholic extract of aerial part of leonurus cardiaca on nociceptive response using formalin , tail flick , and hot plate tests in mice .
bt: The present study aims to study the effect of an alcoholic extract of the aerial part of the leonurus cardiaca on the noxious reactive response using formalin, tail flick and test of leonone pilasters in caps, without causing any damage to the kidneys.

src: peripheral osteomas of jaw bone are uncommon and usually associated with gardner 's syndrome . histological examination confirmed the clinical impression of a peripheral osteoma . patient was reviewed after one year and was asymptomatic with no recurrence of the lesion .
bt: Peripheral osteomas of the jaw bone are rare and usually associated with Gardner's syndrome, and the histological examination confirmed the clinical impression of a peripheral osteoma, and the patient was examined after a year and was asymptomatic without recurrence of injury and without symptoms of inflammation.

src: carcinoid bronchopulmonary tumors represent approximately 25% of all carcinoid tumors and 1%2% of all lung neoplasms . the most common symptoms are : persistent cough , asthma - like wheezing , chest pain , dyspnea , hemoptysis and obstructive pneumonitis . we present a case of a young adult diagnosed with a typical carcinoid tumor .
bt: Broncho-pulmonary carcinogens account for about 25% of all carcinogens and 1%-2% of all lung tumors.The most common symptoms are: persistent cough, asthma - such as soffiare, chest pain, dyspnea, emptys, obstructive pneumonitis and fever.We present a case of a young adult diagnosed with a typical carcinogens.

src: matrix metalloproteinase-9 ( mmp-9 ) , regulated by tissue inhibitor of metalloproteinase-9 ( timp-1 ) and the extracellular matrix metalloproteinase inducer ( emmprin ) , contributes to plaque instability . autologous stem cells from bone marrow ( mbmc ) treatment are suggested to reduce myocardial damage ; however , limited data exists on the influence of mbmc on mmps . we investigated the influence of mbmc on circulating levels of mmp-9 , timp-1 , and emmprin at different time points in patients included in the randomized autologous stem - cell transplantation in acute myocardial infarction ( astami ) trial ( n = 100 ) .
bt: The leci metalloproteinase-9 (mmp-9) , regulated by the inhibitor of the tissues of metalloproteinase-9 (timp-1) and the extracellular inductor of metalloproteinase (emmprin) contribute to all plaque instability. It is suggested that the autologous stem cells of bone marrow treatment (mbmc) reduce damage to the myocardium; however, there are limited data on the influence of mbmc on mmps. We have studied the influence of mbmc at various levels of mmp-9 , mm-1 and emprin at various points in time including trapiant cells of randomized stem cells in a study of several patients with heart failure.

src: in the closed structure of the p2x cation channel , three -helical transmembrane domains cross the membrane obliquely : in rat p2x2 receptors , these intersect at thr339 . replacing thr339 by lysine in one , two or three subunits progressively increased chloride permeability and reduced unitary conductance . this implies that the closed - open transition involves a symmetrical separation of the three subunits , and that thr339 from each contributes symmetrically to the open channel permeation pathway .
bt: In the closed structure of the cation channel, three helico-shaped transmembrane domains cross the membrane obliquely: in the p2x2 receptors of the top, these intersect with thr339. substituting thr339 with lysine in one, two or three subunits progressively increases the permeability of the chloride and reduces unit conductivity.This implies that the closed-open transition involves a symmetrical separation of the three subunits, and that thr339 of each contributes symmetrically to the open channel permeability pathway, regardless of the opening state of the channel.

bt: mmp-9, emmprin and cathepsin G have been significantly correlated with myocardial lesions (ck: p = 0.005 and p < 0.001 , respectively) and dimensions of infarction (spec: p = 0.018 and p = 0.008 , respectively).

bt: During the follow-up period, 3.4% of participants responded adequately to only non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs, 57.6% to sulfasalazine, 26.3% to methotrexate supplementation to the previous regimen, and 12.7% to biological agents.During multiple logistic regression results, the underlying disease showed a significant effect on sulfasalazine response.The likelihood of treatment response was 3.53 times higher in USPA patients compared to other patients (probability ratio = 3.53, 95% confidence interval: 1.63-7).

src: recently , management of ludwig 's angina has evolved from aggressive airway management into a more conservative one . this is based on close airway observation on a specialised airway unit and a serial clinical airway assessment . improved imaging modalities , antibiotic therapy , surgical skills , and clinical experience are the key factors behind this change in practice .
bt: Recently, Ludwing's angina management has shifted from aggressive management of aerial life to more conservative management, based on close observation of aerial life by a specialized aerial life unit and a clinical assessment of aerial life in series, but does not include the use of aggressive pharmacological therapies.

src: in the 3d method of treatment , three - dimensional images from computer tomography were used . in treatment plans performed using the 2d method , images from the simulator were used.resultsthe comparison of treatment plans made by using 2d and 3d methods is described . this comparison highlighted the significant differences between these two methods assessing reference dose coverage of the ptv by 100% and 85% isodose.conclusionsreference doses with 100% coverage of the ptv in treatment applied with the 3d method are 31% higher than when applied with the 2d method .
bt: In the 3d treatment method, three-dimensional images were used from the computed tomography. In the treatment plans executed using the 2d method, imaging from the simulator was used. The result of comparing the treatment plans with the 2d and 3d methods is described. This comparison has highlighted the significant differences between these two methods that assess the coverage of the reference dose of 100% ptv and 85% isodose.

src: bladder level reconstruction was performed in 11 cases . five patients were treated only by endoscopic incision . in the follow up period 4 patients showed long term urinary tract infections whereas 3 of them were treated endoscopically .
bt: Reconstruction of the bladder level was performed in 11 cases, five patients were treated with endoscopic incisions alone, and in the follow-up period, four patients had long-term urinary tract infections, while three of them were treated endoscopically and developed complex complications.

bt: The patient admitted that she had often lost doses before this recurrence, and the renal response was maintained since she resumed her pharmaceutical precedents two years ago, concluding that the frequent and severe recurrence of lupus nephritis observed in young patients may actually be due to non-adherence rather than refractory disease and non-treated.

src: the variables related to obesity , lipid profile , and glucose metabolism were also higher in nafld with diabetes and those with grade ii nafld without diabetes , as compared to controls . multivariate stepwise regression analysis showed a negative correlation between hrv and total cholesterol and fat percentage . the grade of nafld as well as diabetic status contributes to the decrease in the cardiovascular autonomic function , with diabetic status rather than grade of nafld playing a critical role .
bt: The variables relative to obesity, lipid profile and glucose metabolism were also higher in people with diabetes and in people with grade II diabetes without diabetes, compared to controls.The analysis of multivariate gradual regression showed a negative correlation between HRV and total cholesterol and percentage of fat.The degree of NASH and the status of diabetes contribute to a decrease in cardiovascular autonomic function, with the status of diabetes rather than the degree of NASH playing a critical role.

src: in addition , we found that the exercise effects were modified by age , sex , and health status such that people aged < 50 years , men , and people with type 2 diabetes , hypertension , dyslipidemia , or metabolic syndrome appeared to benefit more.conclusionsthis meta - analysis showed that exercise significantly improved cardiorespiratory fitness and some cardiometabolic biomarkers . the effects of exercise were modified by age , sex , and health status . findings from this study have significant implications for future design of targeted lifestyle interventions .
bt: In addition, we found that the effects of exercise were modified by age, sex, and health status so that people <50 years of age, men, and people with type 2 diabetes, hypertension, dyslipidemia, or metabolic syndrome seemed to benefit more.Central obesity is another factor that negatively influenced these benefits.Conclusions.This meta-analysis has shown that exercise significantly improved cardiorespiratory fitness and some cardiometabolic biomarkers.Effects of exercise were modified by age, sex, and health status.The results of this study have significant implications for the future design of lifestyle interventions.

src: objectivediabetic patients have a high prevalence of coronary artery disease ( cad ) , but timely diagnosis of cad remains challenging . we assessed the ability of coronary computed tomography angiography ( ccta ) to detect cad in diabetic patients and to predict subsequent cardiac events.research design and methodswe analyzed 140 diabetic patients without known cad undergoing ccta ; 1,782 patients without diabetes were used as a control group . besides calcium scoring and the degree of the most severe stenosis , the atherosclerotic burden score counting the number of segments having either a nonstenotic plaque or a stenosis was recorded .
bt: Targeted diabetic patients have a high prevalence of coronary heart disease (cad), and early diagnosis of cad remains a challenge. we assessed the ability of coronary computed tomography angiography (ccta) to detect cad in diabetic patients and predict subsequent cardiac events. projecting and research methods we analyzed 140 diabetic patients without known cad undergoing ccta; 1,782 patients without diabetes were used as a control group. in addition to the calcium score and the degree of severe stenosis, the atherosclerosis score was recorded by counting the number of segments that have a non-stenosic plaque or st.

src: objectivethe mental health of military personnel varies as a result of different cultural , political , and administrative factors . the purpose of this study was to evaluate the psychological morbidity and quality of life of military personnel in taiwan.materials and methodsthis cross - sectional study utilized the world health organization quality of life instrument , brief version , taiwan version , the general health questionnaire-12 , chinese version , and the visual analog scale ( vas ) in several military units.resultsmore than half of the subjects ( 55.3% ) identified themselves as mentally unhealthy on the general health questionnaire-12 , chinese version ; however , a higher percentage of officers perceived themselves as healthy ( 57.4% ) than did noncommissioned officers ( 38.5% ) or enlisted men ( 42.2% ) . officers also had higher total quality of life ( qol ) scores ( 83.98 ) than did enlisted men ( 79.67 ) .
bt: The goal of military mental health varies due to various cultural, political and administrative factors, and the purpose of this study was to evaluate the psychological morbidity, quality of life and leisure employment of military personnel in Taiwan.

bt: In the transfetted il-10 system, corm-2 had no effect on the lps-induced expression of tn-c and its cytokines in the valley. These data suggest that il-10 mediately inhibited the co-inhibition of tn-c and the production of proinflammatory cytokines in the valley.

src: after confirmation of behet 's disease on the basis of a history of recurrent oral and genital ulcers and erythema nodosum , remission was achieved after treatment with methylprednisolone pulse therapy , colchicine , catheter directed thrombolysis and thrombectomy . however , whilst maintaining anticoagulation therapy , a newly developed pericardial aneurysmal dilatation was noted on follow - up radiologic evaluation . further evaluation revealed right coronary artery stenosis and a left coronary artery pseudo aneurysm ; these additional problems were treated with the nonsurgical insertion of an endovascular graft stent .
bt: Confirmation of Behet's disease based on a history of recurrent oral and genital ulcers and nodular erythema, remission was achieved after treatment with methylprednisolone, colchicine, direct catheter thrombosis and thrombectomy therapy, but while maintaining anticoagulant therapy, a recently developed pericardial aneurysmal dilation was noted following radiological evaluation.Further evaluations revealed right coronary stenosis and left pseudo-coronary aneurysm; these additional problems were treated with the non-surgical insertion of an endovascular transplant stent and respiratory support.
