bt: Gastrostomy and fj were performed on average on the 12th postoperative day, after observing the general condition, the production of chest tubes, lung expansion and the need for ventilation, and significantly improved the clinical condition of patients.

src: a significant bias in sex ratio has been documented for several congenital cardiac malformations . transposition of the great arteries has been associated with a such a bias but no explanation has been proposed for this bias . we evaluated 95 isolated livebirths with transposition of the great arteries cases referred to the sicilian registry of congenital malformations from 1991 to 1998 .
bt: A significant bias in sexual intercourse has been documented for various congenital heart defects.Transmission of the great arteries has been associated with this bias, but no explanation has been proposed for this bias.We evaluated 95 isolated live births with transmission of cases of the great arteries reported from the Sicilian registry of congenital malformations from 1991 to 1998 and found an interesting correlation.

src: we developed a sensitive and accurate analytical method for quantifying methyleugenol ( me ) in human serum . our method uses a simple solid - phase extraction followed by a highly specific analysis using isotope dilution gas chromatography - high resolution mass spectrometry . our method is very accurate ; its limit of detection is 3.1 pg / g and its average coefficient of variation is 14% over a 200-pg / g range .
bt: We have developed a sensitive and accurate analytical method to quantify methyl-me in human serum using a simple solid-phase stratum followed by a highly specific analysis using isotope dilution gas chromatography - high resolution mass spectrometer.Our method is very accurate; its detection limit is 3.1 pg/g and its mean coefficient of variation is 14% over an interval of 200 pg/g, which is broad and useful for various sample types.

bt: No obstruction of the stents was observed during the average follow-up period of 7.3 months (patent rate of 100%), but a new urethral obstruction developed in 4 ureters.There were no cases of stone formation, hyperplastic reaction, incrustation or migration, nor was there a chronic kidney disease.

src: backgroundlimbal ring ( also known as circle ) contact lenses are becoming increasingly popular , especially in asian markets because of their eye - enhancing effects . the pigment particles that give the eye - enhancing effects of these lenses can be found on the front or back surface of the contact lens or enclosed within the lens matrix . the purpose of this research was to evaluate the pigment location and surface roughness of seven types of circle contact lenses.methodsscanning electron microscopic ( sem ) analysis was performed using a variable pressure hitachi s3400n instrument to discern the placement of lens pigments .
bt: The pigment particles that give the eye the effect of improving these lenses can be found on the front or back surface of the contact lens or closed inside the lens matrix and evenly distributed.The purpose of this research was to evaluate the pigment position and surface roughness of seven types of contact lenses in a circle.

src: subsidence and late fusion are commonly observed in anterior subtotal corpectomy and reconstruction for treating thoracolumbar burst fractures . the subsidence rate of this surgical method was reported from 19.6% to 75% in the literatures , which would cause treatment failure . thus , an improvement of anterior surgery technique should be studied to reduce these complications.130 patients of thoracolumbar burst fractures treated by minimal corpectomy , decompression and u cage , between january 2009 and december 2010 were included in this study .
bt: The absorption rate of this surgical method has been reported from 19.6% to 75% in the literature, which would cause a treatment failure.Therefore, if an improvement in the technique of previous surgery should be studied to reduce these complications.130 patients with thoracic subtotal fracture treated with minimal corpetomy, decompression and cage, between January 2009 and December 2010 were included in this study.However, these results could be influenced by non-controlled external variables.

src: retroperitoneal liposarcoma is a rare tumor . the dimension and weight of liposarcoma are variable ; those over 20 kg are called giant liposarcoma. herein , we report giant retroperitoneal liposarcoma measuring 45 cm in diameter and 25 kg in weight encasing the entire left kidney and adherent to adjacent structures .
bt: The size and weight of the liposarcoma are variable; those over 20 kg are called giant liposarcoma.Therefore, we are signalling a giant liposarcoma of 45 cm in diameter and 25 kg in weight that surrounds the entire left kidney and adheres to all adjacent structures and causes constant pain.

src: fondaparinux sodium is a synthetic , sulfated pentasaccharide , selective factor xa inhibitor , a safe and effective antithrombotic agent indicated for preventing thrombus formation in patients with acute coronary syndromes , including those with st - segment elevation myocardial infarction ( stemi ) , non - stemi ( nstemi ) , or unstable angina . major bleeding is rarely known to exist with the use of fondaparinux and to best of our knowledge there exist no isolated case report presenting with fondaparinux - induced major bleeding prescribed for recently diagnosed nstemi . the case report highlights , a need for clinicians to have a sound understanding of anticoagulant pharmacology , dosing , toxicity , individualized approach , and predicting the risk of bleeding before they are prescribed to advancing age persons .
bt: Sodium pentasaccaride is a synthetic pentasaccaride sulfate, inhibitor of selective factor xa, a safe and effective antithrombotic agent indicated for preventing the formation of thrombus in patients with acute coronary syndromes, including those with myocardial infarction (stemi), non-stemi (nstemi) or unstable angina.

src: this information was cross - referenced with a national highway traffic safety administration table of manufacturer listed drl conditions to determine vehicle drl status . crude crash rates for vehicles were calculated relative to the number of all registered vehicles in minnesota in 2004 , for models 19952002 . ninety - five percent confidence intervals ( ci ) for the rates were constructed assuming a poisson error distribution.resultsduring 19952002 , there were 184,637 vehicles ( 1995 or newer ) with identifiable vins involved in accidents which occurred under the specified test conditions .
bt: This information was cross-referenced with a national manufacturer's road safety administration table that lists the drl conditions to determine the drl status of the vehicle.The crude incident rates for vehicles were calculated in relation to the number of all vehicles registered in Minnesota in 2004, for models 1995-2002.Fifty-nine percent confidence intervals for the vehicles were constructed assuming a distribution of Poisson errors.During 1995-2002, there were 184,637 vehicles (in 1995 or more recently) with identifiable wine involved in coinfection.

src: whole blood cultures were stimulated with phytohemagglutinin ( pha ) and concentrations of tumour necrosis factor ( tnf ) , interferon ( ifn ) , interleukin 2 ( il-2 ) , interleukin 12 ( il-12 ) , interleukin 4 ( il-4 ) , and interleukin 10 ( il-10 ) were determined by elisas . a significant increase in cytokine release was detected in hr - hpv - positive women without dysplasia . in women with cervical cancer , release of ifn and il-12 was of the same magnitude as in hr - hpv - positive women without clinical manifestations .
bt: Blood cultures were stimulated with phytoemagglutinin (PHA) and concentrations of tumor necrosis factor (TNF), interferon (IFN), interleukin 2 (IL-2), interleukin 12 (IL-12), interleukin 4 (IL-4) and interleukin 10 (IL-10) were determined by ELISAs.A significant increase in cytokine release was observed in HR-HPV-positive women without dysplasia.In women with cervical cancer, the release of IFN and IL-12 was of the same magnitude as that of HR-HPV-positive women without clinical manifestations.

src: we have previously isolated -cop , the -cop interactor in copi of aspergillus nidulans , by yeast two - hybrid screening . to understand the function of -cop , the anea+ gene for -cop / anea was deleted by homologous recombination using a gene - specific disruption cassette . deletion of the -cop gene showed no detectable changes in vegetative growth or asexual development , but resulted in decrease in the production of the fruiting body , cleistothecium , under conditions favorable for sexual development .
bt: We previously isolated -cop, the -cop interactor in copi di aspergillus nidulans, with yeast due - screening hybrid.To understand the function of -cop, the gene anea+ per -cop / anea was eliminated from the homologous recombination using a specific genetic interruption tape.The cancellation of the -cop gene did not show noticeable changes in vegetative growth or asexual development, but it led to a decrease in the production of the fruiting body, cleistothecium, in favorable conditions for sexual development and resistance to elevated temperatures.

src: the number of death due to cancer has been increasing in korea . chemotherapy is known to cause side effects because it damages not only cancerous cells but healthy cells . recently , attention has focused on food - derived chemopreventive and anti - tumor agents or formulations with fewer side effects .
bt: The number of cancer deaths is on the rise in Korea.Chemotherapy is known to cause side effects because it damages not only tumor cells but also healthy cells.Recently, attention has been focused on chemopreventive and antitumor agents derived from foods or formulations with fewer side effects and their natural alternatives such as the ortica.

src: exosomes are small extracellular vesicles , which stem from endosomes fusing with the plasma membrane , and can be recaptured by receiving cells . they contain lipids , proteins , and rnas able to modify the physiology of receiving cells . functioning of the brain relies on intercellular communication between neural cells .
bt: Exosomes are small extracellular vesicles, derived from endosomes that fuse with the plasma membrane, and can be recaptured by the recipient cells.They contain lipids, proteins and RNA that can alter the physiology of the recipient cells, but do not contain enzymatic enzymes.

bt: The compound emits red orange fluorescence at around 600 nm and has been studied at maximum intensity at mn2+ doping concentration of 15 a.% and is relatively more stable at low levels of acid and alkaline pH. The structural characteristics and optical properties have been carefully analyzed using the Fourier transform in infrared, X-ray diffraction, dynamic light diffraction, visible ultraviolet and fluorescent spectroscopy.

src: food chain information ( fci ) is an innovation of the new european regulation . its purpose is to enhance the concept of food security . fci includes specifications such as : health status , information on treatments and diseases , analytical reports on control plans , zoonoses or environmental contaminants , production performance , etc .
bt: Food chain information (FCA) is an innovation of the new European regulation, which aims to improve the concept of food safety.The FCA includes specifications such as: health status, information on treatments and diseases, analytical reports on control plans, zoonoses or environmental contaminants, production performance, and environmental assessments.

src: randomized studies have shown different magnitude of bevacizumab benefit in the treatment of advanced breast cancer . regulatory agencies have modified bevacizumab treatment indications across different regions . in this study , we perform a meta - analysis of phase iii studies aiming to interrogate the magnitude of bevacizumab benefit for the treatment of first - line her2-negative metastatic breast cancer ( mbc ) .
bt: Randomized studies have shown various dimensions of bevacizumab's benefit in the treatment of advanced breast cancer, regulatory agencies have modified the indications for bevacizumab treatment in different regions, and in this study we conduct a meta-analysis of phase iii studies aimed at questioning the extent of bevacizumab's benefit in the treatment of her2-negative first-line metastatic breast cancer (mbc) and find that the results are conflicting.

src: recent work demonstrates that retention of a single functional retinoblastoma susceptibility ( rb1 ) allele is insufficient to maintain genome stability . haploinsufficiency of rb1 accelerates cancer pathogenesis in concert with inactivation of tumor protein p53 . collectively , multiple lines of evidence suggest revision of the 2-hit model to include conditional haploinsufficiency of rb1 .
bt: Recent research shows that the preservation of a single functional allele of retinoblastoma sensitivity (rb1) is insufficient to maintain the stability of the genome.Rb1 appionsuficiency accelerates tumor pathogenesis in concertation with the inactivation of tumor protein p53.Collectively, multiple evidence suggests revising the 2-hit model to include rb1 conditional appionsuficiency and its role in promoting resistance to therapy.

src: this research takes place in the s(ma)2d project which proposes software architecture to monitor elderly people in their own homes . we want to build patterns dynamically from data about activity , movements , and physiological information of the monitored people . to achieve that , we propose a multiagent method of classification : every agent has a simple know - how of classification .
bt: This research is being carried out in the project s) ma2d which proposes a software architecture to monitor the elderly in their homes.We want to build models dynamically based on activity data, movements and physiological information of the people monitored.To achieve this goal, we propose a multi-agent classification method: each agent has a simple knowledge of the classification and legal requirements.

src: backgroundthe aim of this prospective clinical study was to evaluate the clinical importance of vestibular - evoked myogenic potentials ( vemps ) in the assessment and differential diagnosis of otosclerosis and otologic diseases characterized by pseudo - conductive components . we also investigated the clinical appearance of balance disorders in patients with otosclerosis by correlating vemp results with the findings of caloric testing and pure tone audiometry(pta).material / methodsair - conducted(ac ) 4-pta , bone - conducted(bc ) 4-pta , air - bone gap(abg ) , ac , bc tone burst evoked vemp , and calorics were measured preoperatively in 126 otosclerotic ears.resultsthe response rate of the ac - vemps and bc - vemps was 29.36% and 44.03% , respectively . statistical differences were found between the means of abg , ac 4-pta , and bc 4-pta in the otosclerotic ears in relation to ac - vemp elicitability .
bt: The aim of this prospective clinical study was to evaluate the clinical importance of potentially myogenic (vemps) vestibular evokations in the evaluation and differential diagnosis of otosclerosis and otological diseases characterized by pseudo-conducting components.We also studied the clinical aspect of balance disorders in patients with otosclerosis by correlating vemp results with calorie results, facial muscle electromyography, and pure tone audiometry.

src: chronic hepatitis c infection poses a major global health predicament and appears to be potent threat to mankind . the treatment in wide use is interferon / ribavirin combination therapy which is generally effective in about 60 - 70 per cent of patients carrying genotype 3 and causes significant morbidity . the response to therapy is largely guided by limited number of factors such as genotype of virus , rapid virological response , ethnicity , pre - therapy viral load , etc .
bt: Chronic hepatitis C infection is a serious global health problem and appears to be a potent threat to humanity.The treatment in use is interferon/ribavirin combination therapy that is generally effective in about 60 - 70% of patients with genotype 3 and causes significant morbidity.The response to therapy is largely guided by a limited number of factors such as the genotype of the virus, rapid virological response, ethnicity, pre-therapy viral caries, and patient diet.

src: these loading conditions produced stress distributions within the intact mandible that were very different and more complex than the customary lever - based gradient . the analyses also demonstrated the entirely different mechanical environments within intact and plated mandibles . because the loading and geometry of the lever - idealized mandible is incomplete , the associated widely accepted bone stress distribution ( tension on top and compression on the bottom ) should not be assumed .
bt: The caricosa conditions produced stress distributions within the intact mandible that were very diverse and more complex than the usual gradient a lev. Analyses also showed completely different mechanical environments within intact and riveted mandibles. Since the caricosa and the geometry of the idealized mandible a lev are incomplete, it is not necessary to assume the widely accepted bone stress distribution (high tension and low compression).

bt: In the case of dentin, this final measurement was performed with and without the demineralized organic matrix (DOM).Smalto and dentin data were analyzed using the ANOVA/Tukey and Kruskal-Wallis/Dunn tests (p<0.05) respectively, and these results were compared with those obtained from a parallel experiment.

src: diabetes mellitus is a metabolic disorder and its subsequent complications such as retinopathy , nephropathy , ulcers , disability , and amputation increase the burden of the disease . patient knowledge - improving programs are employed to prevent disease progression and to improve the quality of life of the patients . in this way , we need to characterize the groups of patients in urgent need for more and rich - in - content programs .
bt: Diabetes is a metabolic disorder and its successive complications such as retinopathy, nephropathy, ulcers, disability and amputation increase the severity of the disease.Patient awareness-raising programs are employed to prevent the progression of the disease and improve the quality of life of patients.Thus, we must characterize groups of patients who urgently need more and are rich in content programs and psychological support.

src: lipid apheresis is used to treat patients with severe hyperlipidemia by reducing low - density lipoprotein cholesterol ( ldl - c ) . this study examines the effect of apheresis on the lipid panel and cardiac event rates before and after apheresis . an electronic health record screen of ambulatory patients identified 11 active patients undergoing lipid apheresis with 10/11 carrying a diagnosis of fh .
bt: Lipid apheresia is used to treat patients with severe hyperlipidemia by reducing low-density lipoprotein cholesterol (ldl - c).This study examines the effect of apheresia on the lipid panel and rates of heart events before and after apheresia.An electronic monitor of health data from outpatients has identified 11 active patients undergoing lipid apheresia with 10/11 diagnoses and demonstrated significant clinical improvement.

src: here , the trypanocidal potential of gallates was assayed in epimastigotes forms of t. cruzi and also , the interference of these substances on the mitochondrial membrane potential of the parasites was assessed , allowing the study of the mechanism of action of the gallates in the t. cruzi organisms . regarding the preliminary structure - activity relationships , the side chain length of gallates plays crucial role for activity . nonyl , decyl , undecyl , and dodecyl gallates showed potent antitrypanosomal effect ( ic50 from 1.46 to 2.90 m ) in contrast with benznidazole ( ic50 = 34.0 m ) .
bt: In addition, the interference of these substances with the potential of the parasite mitochondrial membrane has been evaluated, allowing the study of the mechanism of action of the gallate in the organisms of the gallate.In relation to the preliminary structure - activity relationships, the length of the lateral chain of the gallate plays a crucial role for the activity.Nonyl, decyl, undecyl and dodecyllates have shown a potent antitrypanosomal effect (IC50 at 1.46 to 2.90 M) in contrast to benzyl (IC50 = 34,)

src: early diagnosis and management of depression is important for better therapeutic outcome . strategies for distinguishing between unipolar and bipolar depression are yet to be defined , resulting improper management . this study aims at comparing the socio - demographic and other variables between patients with unipolar and bipolar depression , along with assessment of severity of depression.this cross sectional study was conducted in a tertiary care psychiatry hospital in north - east india .
bt: Early diagnosis and management of depression are important for a better therapeutic outcome. strategies for distinguishing between unipolar and bipolar depression have not yet been defined, which has led to improper management.This study aims to compare socio-demographic and other variables among patients with unipolar and bipolar depression, along with an assessment of the severity of depression and differences in therapeutic responses.

src: prune2 plays an important role in regulating tumor cell differentiation , proliferation , and invasiveness in neuroblastoma . our previous study revealed that prune2/obscn two - gene relative expression classifer accurately differentiated leiomyosarcoma from gastrointestinal stromal tumor . however , the association between prune2 expression and prognosis in leiomyosarcoma is poorly understood .
bt: Our previous study revealed that the relative expression of two prune2/obscn classificher genes accurately differentiated leiomyosarcoma from gastrointestinal stroma tumor.However, the association between prune expression2 and prognosis in leiomyosarcoma is poorly understood, although some recent studies have suggested a possible relationship.

src: the accumulation of excess body weight may have important health and disease consequences for persons with multiple sclerosis ( ms ) . this study examined the effect of weight status on mobility using a comprehensive set of mobility outcomes including ambulatory performance ( timed 25-foot walk , t25fw ; 6-minute walk , 6mw ; oxygen cost of walking , cw ; spatiotemporal parameters of gait ; self - reported walking impairment , multiple sclerosis walking scale-12 ( msws-12 ) ; and free - living activity , accelerometry ) in 168 ambulatory persons with ms . mean ( sd ) bmi was 27.7 ( 5.1 ) kg / m2 .
bt: This study examined the effect of weight on mobility using a complete set of mobility results including outpatient performance (walking at 25 feet, t25fw; walking at 6 minutes, 6mw; walking oxygen cost; walking time; walking time; walking time; walking self-diagnosis; walking time disorder; walking time multiple sclerosis (MSW-12); and free-living activity (accelerometry) in 168 outpatient people with MS. In addition, dermatological conditions were reported in these patients, with a median (SD) bmi age of 27.7 (5,1 kg) / m2.

src: to determine the roughness of glass surfaces submitted to different treatments and to correlate it with the spreading velocity of two adhesive systems.glass slides were used as substrates to evaluate the spreading velocity of single bond and prime & bond nt adhesive systems . six different surface treatments were compared : 1 ) no treatment ; 2 ) silanization ( sl ) ; 3 ) sandblasting ( sb ) ; 4 ) sb + sl ; 5 ) 10% hydrofluoric acid treatment ( hf ) ; 6 ) hf + sl . before and after treatments , surface roughness was measured by a profilometer ( ra , m ) .
bt: To determine the roughness of glass surfaces undergoing various treatments and to correlate it with the diffusion rate of two adhesives, glass slides were used as substrate to evaluate the diffusion rate of a single first- and first-legame system. Six different surface treatments were performed: 1) untreated; 2) silanized (sl); 3) sand (sb); 4) sb + sl; 5) 10% treatment with hydrofluoric fluoric acid (hf); 6) hf + sl. Before and after the treatments, the surface roughness was measured with a profile meter (ra, m).

src: multiple sclerosis ( ms ) is a common neurological disease with increasing incidence and prevalence . onset of disease is most frequently in young adulthood when productivity is usually highest ; it is of chronic nature and , in the majority of patients , it will result in accumulation of disability . due to loss of productivity in patients and caregivers as well as high expenses for medical treatment , ms is considered a disease with high economic burden for patients and society .
bt: Multiple sclerosis (MS) is a common neurological disease with increasing incidence and prevalence.The onset of the disease is most common in young adulthood when productivity is usually highest; it is chronic in nature and, in most patients, will result in accumulation of disability.Due to the loss of productivity among patients and healthcare professionals as well as the high costs of medical treatment, MS is considered a disease with a high economic burden on patients and society, requiring constant and careful treatment.

src: drug - induced gingival overgrowth ( digo ) can be a serious concern for both patients and clinicians . digo is a well - documented side - effect of some pharmacologic agents , including , but not limited to , calcium channel blockers , phenytoin , and cyclosporine . plasma cell granulomas ( pseudotumors ) are exceedingly rare , non - neoplastic , reactive tumor - like proliferation , primarily composed of plasma cells that manifest primarily in the lungs , but may occur in various anatomic locations .
bt: The excessive growth of drug-induced gingivitis (diges) can be a serious concern for both patients and doctors, and the influence of drugs on other organs can further exacerbate these concerns, and is a well-documented side effect of some pharmacological agents, including, but not limited to, blockers of calcium channels, phenitoin and cyclosporin. Plasma cell granulomas (pseudotumors) are extremely rare, non-neoplastic, reactive tumors - like proliferation, composed primarily of plasma cells that are primarily expressed in the lungs, but can occur in anatomical locations.

bt: The quadratic statistical analysis of who has been used to test the importance of the association between doctors and nurses with various result variables (motivators per reference, perceived barrier, preferred person per reference, patient outcome influencing signaling behaviours and levels of professional stress) has been considered significant.

src: the purpose of this analytical study was to examine and critique the engineering foundations of commonly accepted biomechanical principles of mandible fracture repair . materials and methods . basic principles of static equilibrium were applied to intact and plated mandibles , but instead of the traditional lever forces , the mandibles were subjected to more realistic occlusal forces .
bt: The purpose of this analytical study was to examine and criticize the engineering basis of the generally accepted biomechanical principles of jaw fracture repair.Moreover, materials and methods. basic static equilibrium principles have been applied to intact and riveted jaws, but instead of the traditional forces of lift, the jaws have been subjected to more realistic occlusal forces.

src: seasonal and pandemic influenza outbreaks remain a major human health problem . inhibition of the endonuclease activity of influenza rna - dependent rna polymerase is attractive for the development of new agents for the treatment of influenza infection . our earlier studies identified a series of 5- and 6-phenyl substituted 3-hydroxypyridin-2(1h)-ones that were effective inhibitors of influenza endonuclease .
bt: The outbreak of seasonal and pandemic influenza remains an important human health problem.Inhibition of influenza-dependent RNA polymerase endonuclease activity is attractive for the development of new agents for the treatment of influenza infection.Our previous studies have identified a series of 5- and 6-phenyl substitute 3-hydrossipiridine-2 ((1h) -one) that were effective inhibitors of influenza endonuclease and potentially beneficial for reducing respiratory symptoms.

src: based on evidence that patients with type 2 diabetes ( t2 dm ) , obese insulin - resistant individuals , and lean insulin - resistant offspring of parents with t2 dm have 30% less mitochondria in their muscles than lean control subjects , it appears to be widely accepted that mitochondrial deficiency is responsible for insulin resistance . the proposed mechanism for this effect is an impaired ability to oxidize fat , resulting in lipid accumulation in muscle . the purpose of this counterpoint article is to review the evidence against the mitochondrial deficiency concept .
bt: Based on the evidence that patients with type 2 diabetes (t2dm), insulin-resistant obese individuals and insulin-resistant lean children of parents with t2dm have 30% less mitochondria in the muscles than lean control subjects, it seems to be widely accepted that mitochondrial deficiency is responsible for insulin resistance.The proposed mechanism for this effect is a compromised ability to oxidize fat, resulting in lipid accumulation in the muscle.The purpose of this article is to review the evidence against the concept of mitochondrial deficiency, but not all agree on this interpretation.

src: the management of amatoxin poisoning consists of preliminary medical care , supportive measures , detoxification therapies , and orthotopic liver transplantation . the clinical efficacy of any modality of treatment is difficult to demonstrate since randomized , controlled clinical trials have not been reported . the use of extracorporeal liver assist devices as well as auxiliary liver transplantation may represent additional therapeutic options .
bt: The management of amatoxin poisoning consists of preliminary medical treatment, supportive measures, detoxification therapy and orthopedic liver transplantation.The clinical efficacy of any treatment method is difficult to demonstrate as no randomized and controlled clinical trials have been reported.The use of extracorporeal liver assist devices and auxiliary liver transplantation may represent additional therapeutic options and reduce recovery times.

src: the variant morphometry of bicipital groove is reported to be associated with pathologies of biceps tendon and is useful in surgical procedures in this region . the pathologies of biceps tendon are frequent causes of shoulder pain . therefore , under the condition of paucity of data pertaining to north indians , not only morphometric analysis of bicipital groove and a new definition of narrow / shallow groove to provide logical explanation for dependence of pathologies of biceps tendon on groove morphology is done but also a review of the literature has been carried out .
bt: The variation of the morphometry of the biscipital groove has been reported as associated with the pathology of the biceps tendon and is useful in surgical procedures in this region.Biceps tendon pathology is a frequent cause of back pain.Therefore, in the face of scarcity of data regarding North Indians, not only has the morphometric analysis of the biscipital groove and a new definition of the stretto/shallow groove to provide a logical explanation of the dependence of the pathologies of the biceps tendon on the morphology of the groove been made, but a literature review and a clinical results analysis have also been conducted.

src: a positive association between the time of diabetes duration and higher serum tgf-1 concentrations was observed . similarly , the prevalence of microvascular complications , such as retinopathy and nephropathy , increased with the duration of diabetes . logistic regression analysis showed that serum tgf-1 concentrations and the duration of the disease are independent risk factors of microangiopathy development .
bt: A positive association was observed between the duration of diabetes and higher serum levels of tgf-1. Similarly, the prevalence of microvascular complications, such as retinopathy and nephropathy, increased with the duration of diabetes.Logistic regression analysis has shown that serine levels of tgf-1, duration of the disease and high blood pressure are independent risk factors for the development of microangiopathy.

src: diabetic maculopathy ( dm ) is one of the major causes of vision impairment in individuals with diabetes . the traditional approach to diagnosis of dm includes fundus ophthalmoscopy and fluorescein angiography . although very useful clinically , these methods do not contribute much to the evaluation of retinal morphology and its thickness profile .
bt: Diabetic maculopathy (DM) is one of the leading causes of vision problems in patients with diabetes.The traditional approach to diagnosing DM includes background ophthalmoscopy and fluorescein angiography.Although these methods are very useful clinically, they do not contribute much to the assessment of the morphology of the retina and its thickness profile and sensitivity to neurosensory damage.

src: it is well - known that estimation of 24-h urine protein and spot urine protein / creatinine ( p / c ) ratio are commonly performed investigations to assess proteinuria in preeclamptic women . serum uric acid has been shown to correlate well with disease severity in preeclampsia.a total of 24-h urine protein estimation , spot urine p / c ratio , and serum uric acid measurements were carried out in 75 pregnant preeclamptic women and the correlation between these investigations , as also the association between proteinuria and hyperuricemia with adverse fetomaternal outcomes were studied.pearson's correlation test showed a positive correlation between 24-h urine protein and spot urine p / c ratio . a statistically significant and direct correlation was also found between serum uric acid and spot urine p / c ratio , while there was no statistically significant difference between proteinuria and hyperuricemia with respect to the various fetal and maternal outcome parameters studied.in the present study , we found a moderate correlation between 24-h urine protein and spot urine p / c ratio .
bt: It is noted that estimation of protein in urine and protein in urine spot (p/c) ratio is commonly performed in surveys to evaluate proteinuria in preeclampsia women. It has been shown that uric acid correlates well with the severity of preeclampsia disease. A total of 24 hours of protein estimation in urine, p/c ratio in urine spot, and measurements of uric acid in serum were performed in 75 pregnant women with preeclampsia and positive correlation to these surveys, as well as the association of proteinuria and hyperuricemia with maternal adverse outcomes. Pearson's correlation test showed a protein correlation to urine in 24 hours and a positive correlation to these surveys.

bt: Bacteriology was positive for ascites in only 58.1% of cases, for peritoneal biopsy in 73.3%, while granuloma was found in 95.5%.The chain reaction of the polymerase of tuberculosis (PCR) was positive in 25% of peritoneal biopsy.Mycobacterium bovis was isolated in 23.1% of cases and mycobacterium tuberculosis in 76.9%. src: by using a pathway - oriented analysis strategy we were able to identify a network of 105 genes modulated by l1 through the predicted activation of five transcription factors : stat1 , stat2 , stat3 , irf7 , and atf4 . indeed , l1 overexpression resulted in the strong induction of stat3 phosphorylation which was abolished by antibody - mediated neutralization of il-6r. these results indicated that l1 promoted stat3 activation via the il-6/il-6r axis .
bt: Using a path-oriented analysis strategy we were able to identify a network of 105 genes modulated by l1 through the predicted activation of five transcription factors: stat1 , stat2 , stat3 , irf7 and atf4 .In fact, l1 overexpression led to the strong induction of phosphorylation of stat3 which was abolished by the mediated neutralization of the antibodies of l-6r.These results indicated that l1 promoted the activation of stat3 through the il-6/il-6r axis and the regulation of related genes.

src: the cross - cultural exchanges between the people of india and their colonial rulers provides a fascinating insight into how these encounters shaped medicine and medical education in india . this article traces the history of how indian medicine was transformed in the backdrop of colonialism and hegemony . it goes on to show how six decades after independence , we have have still been unable to convincingly shrug off the colonial yoke .
bt: The intercultural exchanges between the Indian people and their colonial rulers provide a fascinating insight into how these encounters have shaped medicine and medical education in India.This article traces the story of how Indian medicine has been transformed against the backdrop of colonialism and hegemony, and how these dynamics have also influenced Indian culinary culture.

bt: The maldi-tof provides accurate data on the mass intensity of the digested protein peptides, in this case protein kinase pak2 (also called -pak).Pak 2 proteolysis is performed in an offline pepsin digestion.This alternative method, when the user does not have access to a column of HPLC and pepsin is connected to the mass spectrometry, or when the pepsin column on HPLC does not produce an optimal digestion map, for example the strongly disulfide-ligated secret phospholipase a2 (SPLA2), may include the use of alternative enzymes such as trypsin.

bt: It was observed that about 6.6% and 7.0% of even-dispersed tonsil cells and 5.8% and 0.44% of dispersed lung cells are ifn-2+ mast cells and macrophages . Furthermore, the triptase and par-2 peptide agonists induced a higher expression of ifn-2 in a549 cells.

src: sexual assault occurs with alarming frequency in canada . the prevalence of posttraumatic stress disorder ( ptsd ) in assault survivors is drastically higher than the national prevalence of the disorder , which is a strong indication that the current therapies for sexual - assault - related ptsd are in need of improvement . increasing knowledge and understanding of the pathologies associated with rape trauma in biological , psychological and sociological domains will help to develop more effective treatments for survivors .
bt: The incidence of post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD) among aggression survivors is dramatically higher than the national prevalence of the disorder, which is a strong indication that the current treatment for PTSD-sexual assault-related needs to be improved, and this could be due to a lack of adequate psychological support.

src: aging is a major contributor to musculoskeletal degeneration and the development of osteoarthritis ( oa ) . oa is a degenerative disease that involves structural changes to joint tissues including synovial inflammation , catabolic destruction of articular cartilage and alterations in subchondral bone . cartilage degradation and structural changes in subchondral bone result in the production of fragments of extracellular matrix molecules .
bt: Ageing is an important contributing factor to musculoskeletal degeneration and the development of osteoarthritis (oA).OA is a degenerative disease that involves structural changes in joint tissues including synovial inflammation, catabolic destruction of joint cartilage and alterations in subchondrial bone and loss of joint function.

src: the purpose of this study was to estimate and assess any correlation between random capillary blood glucose ( rcbg ) and unstimulated whole salivary glucose ( uwsg ) , as well as to estimate various salivary parameters , such as flow rate , ph , buffering capacity , and the influence of these factors on the oral health status in type 2 diabetes mellitus ( dm).sixty individuals suffering from type 2 dm and 40 healthy individuals in the age group of 3060 years were included in the study . rcbg was estimated using glucometer and uwsg was estimated using photocolorimeter . salivary parameters such as flow rate , ph , and buffering capacity were assessed using gc saliva kit .
bt: The purpose of this study was to estimate and evaluate any correlation between the glucose in the random capillary blood (rcbg) and the unstimulated whole salivary glucose (uwsg), as well as to estimate various parameters of saliva, such as flow, pH, buffering capacity, and the influence of these factors on oral health status in type 2 diabetes mellitus (dm). **In addition**, sixty people with type 2 dm and 40 people in the age group of 30-60 years were included in the study. rcbg was estimated using a glucometer and healthy uwsg was estimated using a photocolormeter.

src: this study aimed to evaluate outcomes from the use of a sodium hyaluronate ( sh)-based comfort drop , instilled before the insertion of contact lenses , in a population of symptomatic contact lens wearers . this was a cross - over , open - label , multi - sites study . subjects were fitted with silicone hydrogel lenses and followed for two months .
bt: This study evaluated the results of using a comfort drop based on sodium ialuronate (sh), instilled before the insertion of contact lenses, in a population of symptomatic contact lens wearers.It was a cross-over, open-label, multi-site study.The subjects were fitted with silicone hydrogel lenses and followed up for two months, and showed no significant improvements.

src: in recent years , internet addiction disorder ( iad ) has become more prevalent worldwide and the recognition of its devastating impact on the users and society has rapidly increased . however , the neurobiological mechanism of iad has not bee fully expressed . the present study was designed to determine if the striatal dopamine transporter ( dat ) levels measured by 99mtc - trodat-1 single photon emission computed tomography ( spect ) brain scans were altered in individuals with iad .
bt: In recent years, the Internet addiction disorder (ID) has become more widespread worldwide and the recognition of its devastating impact on users and society has increased rapidly, however, the neurobiological mechanism of the ID has not yet been fully understood.The present study is designed to determine whether the levels of stral dopamine measured by 99mtc-trodat-1 single photon emission scans computed tomography (spect brain) have been altered in individuals with the ID.

bt: A 42-year-old patient with chronic hepatitis and ulcerative colitis (UC) was admitted to our hospital in August 2004 due to high blood diarrhea and fever.

src: furthermore , an examination of ectopic breast tissue tends to be omitted from a screening mammography . especially , the microcalcifications of ectopic breast tissue are difficult to delineate on mammography . herein , the authors report a case of ectopic breast carcinoma that showed clustered microcalcifications on screening mammography , and discuss the interpretation and implications of microcalcification in ectopic breast tissue .
bt: In addition, an examination of ectopic breast tissue tends to be omitted by a screening mammography.In particular, the microcalcification of ectopic breast tissue is difficult to delineate on mammography.Here, the authors report a case of ectopic breast cancer that has shown clusterate microcalcification on screening mammography, and discuss the interpretation and implications of microcalcification in ectopic breast tissue and in early diagnosis of breast cancer.

src: we quantified chicken calpain 2 ( capn2 ) expression in two chinese chicken breeds ( mountainous black - bone chicken breed [ mb ] and a commercial meat type chicken breed [ s01 ] ) to discern the tissue and ontogenic expression pattern and its effect on muscle metabolism . real - time quantitative pcr assay was developed for accurate measurement of the capn2 mrna expression in various tissues from chickens of different ages ( 0 , 2 , 4 , 6 , 8 , 10 , and 12 weeks ) . results showed that the breast muscle and leg muscle tissues had the highest expression of capn2 compared to the other tissues from the same individual ( p < .05 ) .
bt: We quantified the expression of calpain 2 (capn2) in chicken in two breeds of Chinese chicken (black-bone mountain chicken [mb] and a commercial meat breed [s01]) to discern the pattern of tissue and ontogenic expression and its effect on muscle metabolism.A quantitative real-time PCR assay was developed to accurately measure the expression of capn2 mRNA in various chicken tissues of different ages (0, 2, 4, 6, 8, 10 and 12 weeks) and we found that expression varies significantly between studies of the two breeds.

bt: In most cases, the abnormal glucose developed after three doses of l-asp decreases while l-asp persists until the end of our observation period. l-asp produces more incidence of hyperglycemic hypoglycemia in a good number of patients towards whom doctors should be more attentive and this effect occurs more frequently in the first days of treatment.

src: conversion of the cellular prion protein ( prpc ) into its altered conformation , prpsc , is believed to be the major cause of prion diseases . although prp is the only identified agent for these diseases , there is increasing evidence that other molecules can modulate the conversion . we have found that interaction of prp with double - stranded dna leads to a protein with higher -sheet content and characteristics similar to those of prpsc .
bt: The conversion of cellular prion protein (prpc) into its altered conformation, prpsc, is considered the main cause of prionic diseases. although prp is the only agent identified for these diseases, there is increasing evidence that other molecules may modulate the conversion. we have found that the interaction of prp with double-stranded DNA leads to a protein with a higher foil content and characteristics similar to those of prpsc, significantly influencing the progression of diseases.

src: in the functional characterization , neutralization of xcina toxicity by immunity domain of ximb gene was determined by endogenous assay . exogenous toxic assays results showed that only the purified recombinant xenocin - immunity domain ( 10 kda ) protein complex had toxic activity . atypical cognate immunity protein ( 42 kda ) of xenocin was fusion of immunity domain ( 10 kda ) and hemolysin domain ( 32 kda ) .
bt: In functional characterization, the neutralization of xcina toxicity and immune domain of the ximb gene was determined by endogenous assay.Results of exogenous toxic assays showed that only the recombinant protein complex purified of xenocin - immune domain (10 kda) had toxic activity and did not cause allergic reactions.

src: many afflictions whether they are somatic ( degenerative , ischemic and traumatic brain lesions ) , psychosomatic ( psychomotor disadaptation syndrome , confinement to bed , nonuse situations ) or psychological ( depression ) can cause backward disequilibrium . a vicious circle of falls , and loss of autonomy can arise and this is the main consequence of backward disequilibrium . thus , in this paper , we review backward disequilibrium in elderly subjects with regard to the causes , consequences , assessment , and management .
bt: Many disorders, whether somatic (degenerative, ischemic and traumatic brain injury), psychosomatic (psychomotor disadaptation syndrome, confinement to bed, non-use situations), or psychological (depression) can cause a retrograde imbalance. A vicious cycle of falling and loss of autonomy can be created, and this is the main consequence of a retrograde imbalance. Thus, in this article, we review the retrograde imbalance in older subjects for the causes, consequences, evaluation and management and this aspect has a significant impact on the quality of life of patients.

src: we measured nirs and plasma monoamine metabolite levels in a patient with bipolar disorder . a 22-year - old man was admitted due to major depression . at admission , nirs findings showed oxygenated hemoglobin reincrease in the posttask period , which is characteristic of schizophrenia .
bt: We measured the levels of Nirs and monoamine plasma metabolites in a patient with bipolar disorder.A 22-year-old man was hospitalized for severe depression.All in all, Nirs' results showed an increase in oxygenated hemoglobin in the post-task period, which is characteristic of schizophrenia and depression.

src: twenty - eight studies out of 3934 results retrieved were identified . in the overall analysis , 46.4% and 51.6% of deaths were related to noncardiovascular causes within and after the first 30 days , respectively . within 30 days of tavr , infection / sepsis ( 18.5% ) , heart failure ( 14.7% ) , and multiorgan failure ( 13.2% ) were the top 3 causes of death .
bt: Twenty-eight studies on 3934 recovered results have been identified.In the overall analysis, 46.4% and 51.6% of deaths were related to non-cardiovascular causes within and after the first 30 days, respectively.During 30 days of TAVR, infection/sepsis (18.5%), heart failure (14.7%), and multiorgan failure (13.2%) were the top 3 causes of death.Moreover, most patients had fever and joint pain.

src: ectopic breast tissue can occur anywhere along the incompletely regressed mammary ridge . among the various types of breast choristoma , ectopic breast tissue , which has only glandular tissue without a nipple or areola , is most commonly detected in axillary areas . however , ectopic breast cancer is often not detected until significant clinical symptoms have been revealed , or diagnosis is delayed .
bt: Among the various types of breast choristoma, ectopic breast tissue, which is the only glandular tissue without a capsule or areola, is most commonly detected in the assillary areas; however, ectopic breast cancer is not often detected until significant clinical symptoms or late diagnosis have been revealed, and this can lead to a worse prognosis.

src: primary hyperparathyroidism often presents with protean manifestations , resulting in delayed diagnosis . at times , aberrant development and migration of the gland leads to ectopic location leading to problems in localization . judicious use of combination methods of localization is recommended in treatment failure or recurrent disease .
bt: Primary hyperparathyroidism often presents itself with protein manifestations, such as edema, which lead to a delayed diagnosis; sometimes, aberrant development and migration of the gland leads to ectopic position, which leads to localization problems.

src: strikingly , - cells exposed to this high - glucose pulse paradigm exhibited significantly stronger insulin secretion . this metabolic memory was entirely dependent on camkii . metabolic memory was reflected on the protein level by increased expression of proteins involved in glucose sensing and ca2 + -dependent vesicle secretion , and by elevated levels of the key - cell transcription factor mafa .
bt: Surprisingly, cells exposed to this paradigm of high glucose impulses exhibited significantly higher insulin secretion, which was entirely dependent on the cell membrane, and reflected on the protein level by increasing the expression of proteins involved in glucose detection and secretion of ca2+-dependent vesicles, and increasing levels of the key factor in cell transcription and regulating metabolic processes.

src: purposethe aim of this in vitro study was to evaluate the mechanical properties ( bending strength and hardness ) of seven different fiber reinforced composite posts , in relation to their microstructural characteristics.materials and methodstwo hundred eighty posts were divided into seven groups of 40 , one group for each type of post analyzed . within each group , 15 posts were subjected to three - point bending strength test , 15 to a microhardess meter for the knoop hardness , and 10 to scanning electron microscope in order to determine the diameter of the fibers and the percentage of fibers embedded in the matrix . to compare the flexural strength in relation to the type of fiber , matrix , and the hardness of the posts , a kruskal - wallis h test was used .
bt: The purpose of this in vitro study was to evaluate the mechanical properties (folding strength and hardness) of seven different fiber-reinforced compound posts in relation to their microstructural characteristics.The materials and methods were divided into seven groups of 40, one group for each type of post analyzed.In each group, 15 posts were subjected to a three-point bonding resistance test, 15 to a microhardness meter for the hardness of the node, and 10 to a scanner using an electronic microscope to determine the diameter of the fibers and the percentage of fibers incorporated into the matrix.

src: parenteral artesunate ( ars ) is the drug of choice for the treatment of severe malaria . pharmacokinetics data on intramuscular ars are limited with respect to the main treatment group that carries the highest mortality , namely , critically ill children with severe malaria . a population pharmacokinetic study of ars and dihydroartemisinin ( dha ) was conducted from sparse sampling in 70 tanzanian children of ages 6 months to 11 years .
bt: Parenteral artesunate (ars) is the drug of choice for treating severe malaria. pharmacokinetic data on intramuscular ars are limited compared to the main treatment group that carries the highest mortality, i.e. seriously ill children with severe malaria.A pharmacokinetic study of ars and diidroartemisinin (dha) population was conducted with a small sample of 70 Tanzanian children aged between 6 months and 11 years, and significant side effects were detected.

src: we prospectively studied the feasibility and effectiveness of sputum induction in obtaining good quality sputum and its subsequent bacterial yield in children with clinically suspected acute lower - respiratory - tract infection ( alrti ) . good quality sputum was collected in 89/98 ( 91% ) patients . sputum cultures revealed 1 bacterial pathogens in 22 cases ( 25% ) .
bt: We have studied in perspective the feasibility and effectiveness of sputum induction to obtain a good quality sputum and its subsequent bacterial yield in children with clinical suspicion of acute infection of the lower respiratory tract (alerte).Good quality sputum was collected in 89/98 (91%) patients.

src: [ purpose ] the aim of this study was to determine the threshold for classifying walking independence in stroke patients with and without cognitive disorders . [ subjects ] the subjects were 130 patients with initial stroke hemiplegia . [ methods ] the following factors were analyzed for associations with walking independence : brunnstrom stage , one - leg standing time on the paralytic side , one - leg standing time on the non - paralytic side , and 10-m walking speed .
bt: The purpose of this study was to determine the threshold for classifying the independence of walking in stroke patients with and without cognitive impairment.In addition, the effectiveness of physiotherapy treatment was assessed.The subjects were 130 patients with initial epilepsy of the stroke.The following factors were analyzed for the associations with walking independence: brunnstrom stage , standing time of a leg on the side of the leg, standing time of a leg on the side of the leg and walking speed of 10 meters.

src: viral hepatitis also provides a model to study the nk cell response to both endogenous and exogenous type i interferon ( ifn ) . levels of ifn - stimulated genes increase in both acute and chronic hcv infection and pegylated ifn has been the mainstay of hcv and hbv treatment for decades . in chronic viral hepatitis , nk cells display decreased production of antiviral cytokines .
bt: Viral hepatitis also provides a model for studying the response of NK cells to both endogenous and exogenous interferon type i (ifn).The levels of IFn-stimulated genes increase in both acute and chronic HCV infection and pegylates have been the main pillar of treatment for HCV and HbV for decades, and this has significantly influenced the therapeutic approach in the field of viral infection.

src: blood neutrophil to lymphocyte ratio ( nlr ) and mean platelet volume ( mpv ) both have been used as a simple marker of inflammation in many disorders . here , we aimed to investigate the relationship between nlr , mpv , and familial mediterranean fever ( fmf).in this retrospective study , the files of fmf patients in pediatric rheumatology outpatient clinic were reviewed . there were 160 participants ( 68.4% ) in the fmf patient group and 74 participants ( 31.6% ) in the control group .
bt: Neutrophil-lymphocyte (nlr) and mean volume of platelets (mpv) have both been used as a simple marker of inflammation in the blood in many disorders.There, we sought to investigate the relationship between nlr, mpv and familial Mediterranean fever (fmf).In this retrospective study, the files of fmf patients in pediatric rheumatology were examined.There were 160 participants (68.4%) in the fmf patient group and 74 participants (31.6%) in the control group.Here are interesting findings that could indicate a significant correlation.

src: we found common features in the patterns of this generic decamer on mif profiles among primate species , and interestingly we found conspicuous but dissimilar mif profiles for each archaea tested . the overall mif profiles for each chromosome in each primate species also follow a similar pattern . trifonov 's generic decamer may be a highly conserved motif for the nucleosome positioning , but we argue that this is not the only motif .
bt: We found common features in the models of this generic decamer on mycophonous profiles between primate species, and curiously we found visible but diverse mycophonous profiles for each testate archaea.The overall mycophonous profiles for each chromosome in each primate species also follow a similar model.The trifonov generic decamer may be a highly conservative motif for the nucleosome positioning, but we hold that this is not the only motif and may vary depending on specific genetic conditions.

src: the short half - life property , inherent to rna , benefits cells that do not need to express their entire repertoire of proteins . the cellular machinery turns off the production of a given protein by shutting down the transcription of its cognate coding gene and by either actively degrading the remaining mrna or allowing it to decay on its own . the steady - state level of each mrna in a given cell varies continuously and is specified by changing kinetics of synthesis and degradation .
bt: The short half-life property inherent in RNA benefits cells that do not need to express their entire protein repertoire, and the cellular mechanism mirrors the production of a particular protein by shutting down the transcription of its cognate coding gene and actively degrading the rest of the RNA or allowing it to decay on its own.The stable state level of each RNA in a particular cell varies continuously and is specified by changing the kinetics of synthesis and degradation, thus influencing the activity of the expressed proteins.

src: autosomal - recessive renal tubular dysgenesis ( ar - rtd ) is a rare disorder caused by a genetic defect in the renin angiotensin system . although ar - rtd has typically been known as a lethal disease due to refractory hypotension and renal failure immediately after birth , few cases have reported survival of the neonatal period . we report here an additional case of ar - rtd , who had novel ace mutations and survived over 2 years and provide a review of the five previously reported surviving cases .
bt: Autosomal recessive renal tubular dysgenesis (ar - rtd) is a rare disorder caused by a genetic defect of the angiotensino-renin system.Although ar - rtd has typically been known as a fatal disease due to refractory hypotension and renal failure immediately after birth, few cases have reported survival in the neonatal period.Secondly, an additional case of ar - rtd, which has had mutations in the novella ace and survived over 2 years, provides a review of the five surviving cases previously reported.

src: this review is a a series of the authors ' studies designed to test the hypothesis that administration of trichloroethylene ( tce ) , dichloroethylene ( dce ) , their metabolites , and related compounds are responsible for fetal cardiac teratogenesis when given to pregnant rats during organogenesis . identification of teratogenic compounds will allow more accurate assessment of environmental contaminants and public health risks . epidemiologic studies and previous teratogenic studies using chick embryos and fetal rats have reported an increased number of congenital cardiac defects when exposed to tce or dce during fetal development .
bt: The review is a series of studies conducted by the authors to test the hypothesis that the administration of trichloroethylene (tce), dichlorohethylene (dce), their metabolites and related compounds are responsible for fetal cardiac teratogenesis when administered to incised mice during organogenesis . The identification of teratogenic compounds allows a more accurate assessment of environmental contaminants and public health risks .

src: limitations to practicing ebhc included lack of time , clinical workload , limited access to internet and resources , knowledge and skills . one quarter of the respondents indicated that they teach ebhc . perceived barriers to teaching ebhc reported related to students ( e.g. lack of interest ) , context ( e.g. access to databases ) and educators ( e.g. competing priorities ) .
bt: The limitations of EBC practice include lack of time, clinical workload, limited access to the Internet and resources, knowledge and competence, and difficulty in implementation.

src: from 2001 to 2011 , the proportion of patients whose eligibility for spironolactone was not assessed decreased ( 66.9% in 2001 to 32.8% in 2011 ) . spironolactone use significantly increased among ideal patients over this period ( 28.6% to 72.4% ; p<0.001 for trend ) , but also in contraindicated patients ( 11.4% to 27.5% ; p=0.002 for trend ) and in other patients groups ( not indicated : 27.5% to 38.3% ; unknown indications : 21.3% to 35.1% ; both p<0.01 for trend ) . in all 4 groups , patients presenting with hf on admission were more likely to receive spironolactone.conclusionsalthough the appropriate use of spironolactone and assessment of eligibility increased in china over the past decade , there remains marked opportunities for improvement.clinical trial registrationurl : http://www.clinicaltrials.nct01624883 .
bt: From 2001 to 2011 the percentage of patients whose fitness for spironolactone has not been evaluated decreased (66.9% in 2001 to 32.8% in 2011).The use of spironolactone has increased significantly from an ideal patient to an ideal patient during this period (28.6% to 72.4%; p<0.001 per trend) but also in contraindicated patients (11.4% to 27.5%; p=0.002 per trend) and in other patient groups (unindicated: 27.5% to 38.3%; unknown indications: 21.3% to 35 Dal).

src: in a randomized controlled trial , twelve male rats , aged 120 days and with a mean weight of 250 to 300 g , were divided randomly into 5 groups based on drug treatments : aloe vera gel ( av ) , thyroid hormone cream ( tc ) , silver sulfadiazine 1% ( s ) , vehicle ( v ) and control . to evaluate the efficacy of each treatment technique , a biomechanical approach was used to assess tensile stress after 14 days of treatment . tensile stress was significantly improved in the aloe vera gel group as compared with the other four groups ( p0.05 ) .
bt: In one randomized controlled study, twelve male rats, aged between 120 days and with an average weight of 250 and 300 g, were divided into 5 groups on a case-by-case basis based on the pharmacological treatments: aloe vera gel (av), thyroid hormone cream (tc), sulfadiazine argento 1% (s), vehicle (v), and control.To evaluate the effectiveness of each treatment technique, a biomechanical approach was used to evaluate traction stress after 14 days of treatment.

src: a multicenter , retrospective case series.in the past several years , screw fixation of the cervical spine has become commonplace . for the most part , this is a safe , low - risk procedure . while rare , screw backout or misplaced screws can lead to morbidity and increased costs .
bt: In recent years, fixing cervical spine screws has become common, for the most part a safe and low-risk procedure, but while rare, recoil screws or incorrect screws can lead to morbidity and increased costs, this can also cause problems with patient mobility.

src: size , multifocality , and bilateralism of ptm foci , thyroid capsule invasion , and presence of lymphovascular invasion were histopathological parameters . we analysed adjuvant medical and nuclear treatment and patients ' outcome during follow - up period of 102 ( 61144 ) months . the prevalence rates of i - ptm were 9.4% in 395 thyroidectomy cases .
bt: The size, multifocalism and bilateralism of the PTM focuses, the invasion of the thyroid capsules and the presence of lymphovascular invasions were histopathological parameters.We analyzed adjuvant medical and nuclear treatment and patient outcomes during the 102 month follow-up, and noted a significant relationship with patient age.

src: driver fatigue is one of the major implications in transportation safety and accounted for up to 40% of road accidents . this study aimed to analyze the eeg alpha power changes in partially sleep - deprived drivers while performing a simulated driving task.twelve healthy male car drivers participated in an overnight study . continuous eeg and eog records were taken during driving on a virtual reality simulator on a monotonous road .
bt: Fatigue is one of the main implications of transport safety and accounts for up to 40% of road accidents.This study aimed to analyze the power changes of an alpha egg in drivers partially dreamed while performing a simulated driving task.Twelve healthy male car drivers participated in a nightly study and showed greater fatigue during the experiment.

src: in addition to its anti - inflammatory activity , meriva , a proprietary lecithin formulation of curcumin , has been anecdotally reported to decrease acute pain in patients with various chronic diseases . given that curcumin can desensitize transient receptor potential a1 , a nociceptor seemingly also mediating the analgesic effect of acetaminophen , as well as inhibiting and downregulating the expression of cyclo - oxygenase 2 , the selective target of nimesulide , a nonsteroidal anti - inflammatory agent , we carried out a pilot comparative study of the acute pain - relieving properties of these three agents . at a dose of 2 g ( corresponding to 400 mg of curcumin ) , meriva showed clear analgesic activity , comparable with that of a standard dose ( 1 g ) of acetaminophen , but lower than that of a therapeutic ( 100 mg ) dose of nimesulide .
bt: In addition to its anti-inflammatory activity, Meriva, a lecitin formula that is proprietary to curcumin, has been noted to reduce acute pain in patients with various chronic diseases.Since curcumin can desensitize the potential of the transitional receptor a1, a nociceptor that also appears to mediate the analgesic effect of acetaminophen, as well as inhibit and reduce the expression of cyclo-oxygenase 2, the selective bersaglio of nimesulide, a non-steroidal anti-inflammatory agent, we conducted a pilot comparative study of the acute genetic properties of these three agents.A dose of 2 g Meriva (equivalent to 400 mg of curcuminophen), showed that curcumin has analgesic properties.

src: backgroundvarious markers are suggested for diagnosis and monitoring of transitional cell carcinoma of the bladder ( tcc ) , including cytokeratins ( cks).objectivesin the present study , the circulating ck18 ( m65 ) and its caspase - cleaved form , ccck18 ( m30 ) , have been investigated in a group of patients with tcc.patients and methodsserum samples were obtained from 60 patients before surgical resection , among which the samples of 26 patients after resection were also included . we measured the levels of soluble m30 and m65 molecules by enzyme - linked immunosorbent assay . the relation between these markers and patients clinical characteristics was evaluated.resultsm30 and m65 in total patient sera were 148 16 u / l and 318 34 u / l , respectively .
bt: Various markers have been suggested for the diagnosis and monitoring of cellular transition vesicle carcinoma (tcc), including cytokeratine (cks).The objective of this study, the circulating ck18 (m65) and its cespasiatura form, ccck18 (m30), were studied in a group of patients with tcc. Patients and method samples were obtained from 60 patients prior to surgical resection, including samples from 26 patients after the resection were included.We measured the levels of m30 and m65 soluble molecules by an enzyme-related immunosorbent assay.

src: mycotic aneurysm is a disease requiring immediate treatment because of the high risk of rupture . a difficult surgical approach , especially in the case of occurrence on the iliac artery , involving endovascular embolization and extra - anatomic bypass grafting , is known to be a suitable treatment . we performed extra - anatomic bypass grafting after endovascular embolization successfully in two patients .
bt: A difficult surgical approach, especially in the case of an endovascular embolism and an extra-anatomical bypass implant, is known to be an appropriate treatment.We have successfully performed an extra-anatomical bypass implant after endovascular embolism in two patients, and this has led to positive results in reducing symptoms.

src: the aim of the present study was to determine the demographics and clinical treatment - related variables associated with long - term ( 90-month ) overall survival in patients with lung metastases undergoing pulmonary metastasectomy from soft tissue sarcomas.we performed a retrospective review of patients admitted in the thoracic surgery department with lung metastases who underwent thoracotomy for resection following treatment of the primary tumor . data regarding primary tumor features , demographics , treatment , and outcome were collected.one hundred twenty - two thoracotomies and 273 nodules were resected from 77 patients with previously treated soft tissue sarcomas . the median follow - up time of all patients was 36.7 months ( range : 10 - 138 months ) .
bt: The purpose of this study was to determine the demographics and clinical treatment - correlated variables associated with the overall long-term survival (90 months) of patients with pulmonary metastasis undergoing pulmonary metastasectomy and soft tissue sarcomas.We conducted a retrospective review of patients admitted to the chest surgery department with pulmonary metastasis who had undergone chest surgery for the resection after treatment of the primary tumor.Data on the primary characteristics, demography, treatment and tumor outcome were collected.One hundred ventilated chest resections and 273 nodes were performed on 77 patients with a total of 77 tumours.

bt: The study included crural repair, the creation of a small stomach pouch (30 ml), and intestinal bypass (150 to 180 cm).All patients were followed in clinic and by telephone.From February 1999 to April 2001, 57 patients (51 f, 6 m) with an average age of 43 years (interval, 22 to 67) and an average BMI of 43 had LRYPB.Hiatal hernias or esophagitis, or both, were present in 48, barrett's in 2.

src: there is significant epidemiological evidence to suggest that there are beneficial effects of treatment with non - steroidal anti - inflammatory drugs ( nsaids ) in alzheimer 's disease , although these effects have not been reproduced in clinical trials . the failure of the clinical trials may be attributed to several possible facts : ( 1 ) nsaids may have been delivered too late to patients , as they may only be effective in early stages of the disease and possibly counterproductive in the late stages ; ( 2 ) the beneficial effect may depend on the drug , because different nsaids may have different molecular targets ; ( 3 ) the nsaid concentration reaching the brain and the duration of the treatment could also be critical , so increasing drug penetration is important in order to improve the efficacy and avoid secondary gastro - intestinal effects of the nsaids . in this report we analyze these different factors , with special emphasis on the role of nsaids in microglia activation over time .
bt: The failure of clinical trials can be attributed to several possible factors: (i) the rashes may have been delivered too late to patients, as they may be effective only in the early stages of the disease and possibly counterproductive in the final stages; (ii) the positive effect may depend on the pharmacist, because different rashes may have different molecular goals; (iv) the concentration of rashes reaching the brain and the duration of treatment may be crucial, so increasing penetration is important to improve efficacy and avoid secondary gastrointestinal growth of rashes.

src: clinical and pathological responses to different chemotherapy regimens were assessed according to world health organization criteria . various factors influencing response to nact and clinical outcome were identified and analyzed.a total of 90 ( 60.8% ) patients received anthracycline - based chemotherapy and 52 ( 35.1% ) patients received mixed anthracycline and taxane - based chemotherapy.119 patients ( 80.4% ) responded to nact either in the form of complete or partial response ( pr ) . complete response was seen in 27 ( 18.2% ) patients and 92 ( 62.2% ) patients showed pr after nact .
bt: A total of 90 (60.8%) patients received anthracycline-based chemotherapy and 52 (35.1%) patients received anthracycline-based chemotherapy and taxano.119 patients (80.4%) responded to nat in the form of a full or partial response (pr).

bt: The correlation coefficients of the CI score with age, years of use and daily hours of Internet use were 0.118 (p = 0.03), 0.014 (p = 0.81) and 0.242 (p < 0.001) respectively.An analysis of multiple linear regression has shown that age ( = 0.111, p = 0.033) and marital status ( = 0.124, p = 0.018) were negatively associated with CI scores while daily hours of Internet use ( = 0.269, p = 0.001) and score were negatively associated with CI scores.

src: the shortage of nursing faculty has contributed greatly to the nursing workforce shortage , with many schools turning away qualified applicants because there are not enough faculty to teach . despite the faculty shortage , schools are required to admit more students to alleviate the nursing shortage . clinical groups in which preceptors are responsible for student learning extend faculty resources .
bt: The lack of teachers of nursing has contributed significantly to the shortage of nursing staff, with many schools rejecting qualified candidates because there are not enough teachers to teach.Despite the shortage of teachers, schools are required to admit more students to alleviate the shortage of nurses.Clinical groups where prelecturers are responsible for student learning extend faculty resources and improve the quality of education.

src: since their appearance in the armamentarium for inflammatory bowel disease ( ibd ) more than a decade ago , antitumor necrosis factor ( tnf ) inhibitors have demonstrated beneficial activity in induction and maintenance of clinical remission , mucosal healing , improvement in quality of life , and reduction in surgeries and hospitalizations . however , more than one - third of patients present primary resistance , and another one - third become resistant over time . one of the main factors associated with loss of response is the immunogenicity of anti - tnf biologics leading to the production of antidrug antibodies ( adabs ) accelerating their clearance .
bt: Since they appeared in the gut inflammatory disease (IBD) wardrobe more than a decade ago, anti-tumor necrosis factor (tNF) inhibitors have shown beneficial activity in inducing and maintaining clinical remission, the healing of the mucosa, improving quality of life and reducing operations and hospitals.However, more than one-third of patients have primary resistance and another third becomes resistant over time.One of the main factors associated with the loss of response is the immunogenicity of anti-tNF biologists that leads to the production of antibody (antibodies) that accelerate their clearance and decrease therapeutic efficacy.

src: was detected by means of pcr in 25/307 carcasses ( 8% ) : 1 bovine ( 2.5% ) , 9 sheep ( 15% ) and 15 goats ( 7.2% ) and was isolated by means of a cultural method in 136/307 carcasses ( 44% ) . moreover , additional analysis , performed on lymph nodes from the same carcasses that had proved positive by pcr , allowed highlighting type 3 brucella abortus in the bovine carcass and type 3 brucella melitensis in the sheep and goat carcasses . the study shows that cattle , sheep and goats meat of animals slaughtered because they had tested positive for brucellosis may be contaminated by brucella spp .
bt: The additional analysis, carried out on the lymph nodes of the same carcasses that were tested positive for pcr, allowed to identify type 3 brucella abortus in the carcass of cattle and type 3 brucella melitensis in the carcass of sheep and goats.The study shows that the meat of cattle, sheep and goats of slaughtered animals because they were tested positive for brucellosis can be contaminated with brucella spp, but not necessarily with other species of bacteria.
